title: Quick Art - 1-Tap Photo Editor
description:
Marvelous real-time cutout camera and one-tap photo editing beyond imagination, with trendy creative photo effects. The distance between you and the pro is only Quick Art Camera and Template! The secret weapon to make your photos stand out!

=== AI Magic, Show Your Style ===

【Cartoon portraits】
Automatically turn your portrait photos into various artistic styles, such as Disney cartoon, sketches, canvases, printings, etc. 

【Real-time Cutout Camera】
Without a green screen, cutout camera can also distinguish between the person and the background in real time, allowing you to traverse into different stereoscopic scenes and designs immediately. It's so much fun! There is also a new effect: add a stunning three-dimensional light effect between you and the original background to make you more beautiful in the lens.

【Trendy templates, create same style】
Rescue novice! Excellent one-tap photo editing template, everyone can make masterpiece in seconds! Each template automatically integrates cutout, stereo background, stereo light effect, layered filters, artistic effects and high-class filters. With just one click, you can easily create your style photos and lead the fashion of social networks!

【Double exposure, create masterpiece of photography】
One-click double exposure, bid farewell to tedious operations, easy to get art blockbusters! Superimpose portraits and various pictures to create a shocking and mysterious visual effect, and immediately form a stunning and dreamy new work!

【Smart cutout, change stereo background】
AI automatic cutout, Quick Art exclusively designed stereo backgrounds such as hollowed-out posters, Van Gogh Polaroid, letter space, doutone, and also carefully selected numerous wallpaper-level backgrounds, such as tropical plants, floral illustrations, minimalist symmetry, and so on. Just one tap, make your style!

【Stereo light effect, heighten atmosphere】
The beautiful stereo light effect immediately enhances the atmosphere of the photo, making you surrounded by fireworks, rainbows or nordic aurora, making the photo render retro glitches or light leaks, making the photo dotted with lens flare or bling sparkle. Such fantastic effects, come and try it!

【Separate people and bg, partial editing】
Quick Art's exclusive feature, separates people from the background, adds different filters and effects to people and the background, that making the inspiration burst instantly! Easily realize all kinds of wild ideas and feel creative!

【Professional Adjust Tools】
Rich advanced color adjust tools, edit like a pro, including brightness, contrast, saturation, color temperature, etc. Helps you control every detail of the details with ease!

summary: One-tap turn your selfie photos into cartoon style and smart cutout
recentChanges: Experience the ultra-convenient camera service with one-click use of filters and graffiti photos
comments: I think it's awesome how this app makes it hard for people to cancel their subscription. The app was so damn laggy I was tapping it to try to hurry it up, when low and behold the subscription button popped up and I tapped it before I could stop myself. There was no verification. Just one tap and I was subscribed. I dont even know how much I just paid for an app I absolutely didnt want. Nice scam you've got going on with that though. Bravo.

Nope. Either a 'free' trial is free or you pay a monthly fee. I'm not putting my card info out there (or paying a fee) before I even get to see what the app does. That said, I'd give this 0 stars if possible. It's just a scam, nothing more and nothing less. A money scam, and if you did put your card info out there, I'd pay close attention to my bank charges.

I cannot express how shocked I am over seeing 34.99 taken from my checking account. I had no idea I subscribed. I work on a mobile app and the way they get you to subscribe is underhanded. I don't even know what I selected. I was able to cancel easily in the Play store. I didn't even like the app, I uninstalled the same day I downloaded it.

Pain to use, keeps going to menu, have to keep loading photo, no favourite so have to search for original all the time. 3 day trial, simply cancel as soon as you subscribe - its not hard! Cartoon affects not as advertised...better apps out there.

This app tricked me into subscribing twice - once for a 3 day trial, then it billed me $37.99 - all within a few hours of installation. The payment system is misleading and fraudulent. I require a refund.

title: Photo Editor
description: No photo editing skills are required. You can lose weight and face thinner. Beautify your pictures, adjust brightness, contrast, temperature and saturation. Output high-resolution pictures, which can be shared with your friends.
descriptionHTML: No photo editing skills are required. You can lose weight and face thinner. Beautify your pictures, adjust brightness, contrast, temperature and saturation. Output high-resolution pictures, which can be shared with your friends.
summary: An advanced picture editor
comments: First off, it is VERY limited in what it can do. It can give you a "facelift", although I didn't notice any difference, and other body shaping, which I didn't need for my experimental photo. Only the manual option worked. A circle appeared on my face, but I wasn't ever sure it did anything because there were NO INSTRUCTIONS, and there was a line coming out. I wasn't sure if I was supposed to line it up to something or not. There were filters that played with light but that's it.

Now I can't add text without subscribing? So many features now require payment and it really sucks. The added features are cool and all but I got this app because it was free and easy to use. Now, it has none of that and I can't make a decent simple text graphic without having to...

I rely on this app for all my art projects. It works so well that gives so many options that its hard to find anything else like it. I have to admit sometimes it blurs or makes an image look wonky but the benefits outweigh the negatives. It's worth your time to use or check out.

I upgraded to Gold a few days ago. I have been trying to cancel for the last hour before I get charged and it is impossible. It doesn't have an option on the app like it says. It passes you to your Play account. Here it says I have cancelled from this date in 2021.

xcellent variety of features to choose from. Probably one of the best editors out there, with the bonus of sharing and getting to know the works of others in a like-minded community. The only recommendations I would make would be more offline availability for feature use in both editing

title: Picsart Photo Editor: Pic, Video & Collage Maker
description:
Join the Picsart community of over 150 million creators around the world. With the Picsart photo editor and video editor, you can bring your creativity to life. Make professional-level collages, design and add stickers, quickly remove and swap backgrounds, try popular edits like Golden Hour, Mirror Selfies, and retro VHS or Y2K filters. Picsart is your go-to, all-in-one editor with all the tools you need to give your content a personal flair and make it stand out. 

Picsart Features:

PHOTO EDITOR
• Try trending filters for pictures and popular photo effects
• Use the Background Eraser to erase and replace backgrounds
• Clean up pictures and remove unwanted objects with the Remove Object tool
• Use millions of curated, free images or edit your own pictures
• Add text to photos with 200+ designer fonts
• Retouch selfies with hair color changer, makeup stickers & more
• Blur backgrounds with our AI-powered smart selection tool
• Quickly flip & crop photos
• Add stickers to pictures and create your own stickers

VIDEO EDITOR
• Create and edit videos with our easy-to-use video editor with music
• Take your IG Stories, TikToks & Reels to the next level 
• Add music to your videos using our extensive video editor music library
• Crop video clips to the perfect dimensions and ratios
• Try Glitch video effects and other trendy filters in the video editor
• Trim videos or use smart video merger to blend videos
• Design using the slideshow maker with music
• Add your best moments to a video collage

COLLAGE MAKER
• Create on-trend photo collages with your favorite pictures
• Try photo grid collage, freestyle collage, scrapbook, and frames for pictures
• Go viral with our meme generator & share with friends
• Use the Story Maker and level up your Instagram game with Story templates

STICKER MAKER + FREE STICKERS
• Discover over 60+ million Picsart stickers
• Add stickers to pictures to turn up the fun level on your edits
• Download any sticker for free and use it instantly
• Make your own clipart and create unique custom stickers

PHOTO EFFECTS & FILTERS
• Outline selfies with the popular Sketch effects
• Turn portraits into artistic masterpieces with Canvas effects
• Make Drip Art with dripping effect stickers & customize the blend mode
• Cartoon yourself in seconds with amazing Magic effects

DRAWING TOOL
• Use Picsart Draw with customizable brushes, layers, & pro drawing tools
• Doodle on pictures and create a transparent clothes effect
• Start with a blank canvas to create art and illustrations from scratch
• Play with Doodle Art and scribble away for hours

REPLAY
• Recreate trending edits in a couple of taps. Cut editing time in half with easy customizable steps
• Edit multiple pictures in the same style. 
• Keep your IG feed on-trend and consistent by creating personal presets

👑 PICSART GOLD
• The Picsart Gold subscription grants access to NEW EXCLUSIVE content all the time. Get all the top features with an ad-free editing experience.
---
Start your Picsart Gold membership with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a nominal subscription fee. Your Gold subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. If your subscription is subject to any promotional discount, the discount will expire upon the end of the current period & you’ll be charged the standard rate upon renewal. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off. Your Google Play account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Terms and conditions: https://picsart.com/terms-and-conditions    
About Ads: https://picsart.com/privacy-policy#interest-base

PicsArt, Inc.

One Market Street, Spear Tower, Floor 32

recentChanges:
A major overhaul to the Drawing tool with this update. Check the amazing redesign for yourself and you’ll start applying your strokes of genius in no time. This update includes two things:
- Drawing tool – a complete redesign for a much better user experience.
- Drawing tool – a new and improved Text Brush experience. Now you can apply every font in Picsart using the Text Brush.
comments: First of all, taking away being able to buy things piecemeal was hugely annoying and a bad decision. But worse than that is how, with the latest update, I can no longer use the things I purchased 4 or 5 years ago that I've been using regularly. Why would I ever upgrade if I can't even keep my original purchases??? Taking away the things I spent money on does NOT incentivize me to spend more money with you. It makes me want to go use another platform or buy from a different app altogether.

i used to love this app a lot but it recently started to glitch out and just work slow all together. i've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, even tried restarting my phone a couple of times. also what's up with making the used to be free perks cost? for example, the effects motion and smart blur all of a sudden cost. it's not really a smart move if you ask me. and i hate the ads every second. i open the app; i get an ad. i click a photo; i get an ad.

Awesome app! Helps remove every scrap of originality and hides all my insecurities. Easy to use, makes my dp stand out among the rest and hey, it isn't ever too late to flex on abstract concepts I myself have no idea about! Would definitely recommend for people who WANT to be blocked for some reason🌟🥰!

Do not download! This is a scam. They will offer you a subscription membership for free and then proceed to charge you a yearly membership for $60 US even after you cancel the free trial, even if you were to forget. They won't remind you the trial is over and proceed to charge you for a yearly subscription regardless. This is a scheme!!

I've used this app for many years and it has always been great. However, I noticed that the "shape crop" option does not appear on my new phone. I assume this is a missing feature for specific devices, so I kindly ask to fix it, since it's a feature I use a lot.

title: AirBrush: Easy Photo Editor
description:
Who says we can’t have perfection in our photos? We believe all users should have the best editor and filter technology at their fingertips, and AirBrush continually updates with new features and effects to stay up to date with editing standards. AirBrush was designed to be the best photo editor with user-friendly retouch tools, cool filter options, and natural, beautiful results!

Features:

Blemish and Pimple Remover
** Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples and unwanted spots with the tap of a finger. Add a swipe of blush to add radiance and charm.

Whiten Teeth and Brighten Eyes
** Whitening your teeth takes your smile to the next level! Our teeth whitening function lets you brighten your smile without over-whitening.
** Our “brighten” function enhances your eyes to instantly light up your features.

Perfect Skin in Every Photo
** Retouch, edit and even tan your skin to achieve perfect, glowing perfection in just a few swipes! Your skin will look naturally radiant in all of your selfies and photos! For an added bonus, swipe on a cool blush or rouge to give your cheeks an extra glow.

Slim, Reshape and Lengthen Your Selfie or Photo
** Instantly slim, lengthen or reshape any area of your photo with a few swipes of your finger.

Artistic Retouching Features
** In addition its HD editing features, the AirBrush editor also includes tools that let you blur, crop, stretch, slim and tune your pics for an artistic, beautiful and dramatic touch. Choose to automatically retouch your pictures or fix them manually.

Add Depth and Style to Your Photos
** Our “Blur” editing tool lets you retouch any photos to give it more depth and keep only the things that matter in focus. Your photos and pics will embody the cool perfection seen in professional photography.

Real-Time Editing Technology
** Edit your selfie before taking the picture with real-time editing tools. See your shot on your phone, choose your edits and filters, then snap the photo for a perfect pics every time!

Natural, Radiant Filters
** AirBrush beauty filters were professionally designed to enhance even the best pictures and selfie photos for a perfect, beautiful finishing touch. Some filters can add natural-looking makeup to your pics, like blush or mascara!

Ready to Share?
** This is the editing tool that really gets your picture ready for sharing. When you’re done editing, share your pics to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snapchat right from AirBrush!

Follow us on our official accounts and share your selfies, pictures and comments with us!

• Facebook
• Twitter
• Instagram
• Website

developerAddress: 80 Robinson Road #02-00, Singapore 068898
recentChanges: New hair, new you! Use our brand new Hairline feature to transform your hairstyle and give your face a fresh, new look.
comments: It went from the best app to the worst. I paid for a subscription and for the last 5 months of my subscription if it's not one thing it's another, now I can't load images to edit and following the troubleshooting doesn't work. Unstilling and reinstalling doesn't work. Such a disappointment and a waste of money. Update 7.30.21 I'm still experiencing the samething. Now even Uninstalling and reinstalling is not working. I have premium and it say says I don't and it just renewed last month.

I have not used app for a couple of months and today when I open up the app, because I really need to blur a face on a photo, for publishing on social media, I can't open my album at all. Not photos, downloads, nothing. In other words an app to remove from your phone since it is a non-working app.

This used to be a great app. No more. Only shows me their dumb model photos. I don't want to make over an ugly model! I want to enhance beautiful me! Bye. I have 3 devices, and it doesn't work on any of them. I click on a photo, and it does nothing. You're too hard, and too much trouble to contact in your app. Uninstalled. Not worth the trouble. Don't you know what version you have?

Paid for the upgrade and I'm glad I did, no issues for me with this app and it's very easy to edit photos without being trained in the dark art of photoshop, the quality you can enhance from a picture on your phone without downloading it to a computer and editing it is phenomenal. Only problem I have is working out what filters are what as you can't tell until you put them on. But that's not a problem with the app.

I used to love this app, but now it doesn't even load my images and keeps freezing. Closing the app and reopening it doesn't work. I will try uninstalling and reinstalling, but I have read that also does not help. I am paying for the premium subscription so I am hoping they fix this issue asap. What a bummer.

title: Video Editor & Video Maker - InShot
description:
InShot - Powerful FREE HD Video Editor and Video Maker with professional features. Add music, transition effects, text, emoji and filters, blur background and etc!

Professional video editing features, record your precious moments of your daily life. Top movie maker and HD pro video editor with music, helps you create video with ease, edit video for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter, etc.

InShot is also a photo editor. Edit pictures and selfie, make collage and add text and stickers. Make stories for Instagram.

Features:

🎥All-in-one Video Editor
* Trim and cut videos. Pro video trimmer & cutter and video crop app. Split videos into two parts, Multi-split videos into several clips.
* Video merger. Merge multiple clips into one. Combine and compress video without losing quality. 
* Crop video and Export it in HD quality. Easy-to-use free movie maker and vertical pro vlog maker for YouTube.
* Fit your video and photo in any Aspect Ratio. No crop app for social media, easy-to-use Instagram video maker and TikTok editor.
* Reverse. Rewind your video by one click.
* Rotate/Flip the video.

🎵Music, Sound effects & Recorder
* Video making application with Vlog music. Add InShot featured music or use your own music.
* Extracting music from videos.
* Add your own voice to your video, like a recorder.
* Adjust music volume and music fade in/out option.

💎Video Transition Effects
* Merger 2 clips by adding transition effects to make the transition of video clips more cinematic! Just simple click, you can become a montage video master with InShot.
* Now, 60+ transitions are available in InShot. Such as Fade in/out, Glitch, Light, Ghost, Slice...

✨Video Filters & Video Effects
* Add movie style video filters and full effects such as Glitch effect, stop motion, Retro, RGB, etc.
* Adjust video brightness, contrast, saturation, etc. Customized video filters and video effects.

✏️Text & Sticker
* Add text on video, many fonts for the text editing.
* Add animated stickers and emoji. 1000+ stickers!
* Edit the text and stickers with animation effects.
* Add custom memes and images to videos and photos.

💨Video Speed Control
* Adjust video speed with video filters and video effects. Fast/Slow motion full screen movie maker app.
* Speed up videos or add slow motion. Range from 0.2x to 100x!
* Freeze special moment. 

📀Video Converter & Photo Slideshow Maker
* Easily convert video to MP4 format. Free video cut app.
* Photo slideshow maker, merge photos to create slideshow with music.

🎬Ratio & Background
* Fit your video in aspect ratio.  1:1 for Instagram, 16:9 for YouTube; 9:16 for TikTok... 
* Add different borders and no crop. Background color and video blur editor.

⭐Easy to Share
* Custom video export resolution, HD pro video editor (1080P or 4K) , professional movie maker
* Share your daily life to others on social media!

🖼️Professional Photo Editor & Collage
* Lots of stylish collage layouts.
* Unique filters and colorful backgrounds, blur background.
* Multiple ratios supported. Cute frame.
* 1000+ stickers, add funny memes to your photos.

InShot is an editing app for videos and photos. With InShot, you can easily add music, text and emoji, make videos with cool effects and transitions. Fast/Slow motion feature is super fun. You can crop video easily and export it without losing quality, and share your vlogs to social media to get more likes, or edit video with music and pic for TikTok.

Any questions for InShot (FREE video editor with music & video maker, photo slideshow maker)? Please contact us at inshot.android@inshot.com

Disclaimer:
InShot is not affiliated, associated, sponsored, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter.

Acknowledgements:
FUGUE Music https://icons8.com/music/

comments: You'll like this video/photo editor, I'll admit, I haven't used the app to it's full potential, I've only edited my own videos, but it's simple and easy to use, has numerous options but nothing complex. Great for beginners and expert editors that want basic features with a few better options then other apps. I mainly use this app when I want to trim down/convert recordings that won't otherwise upload to my other more complex apps, and a few effects my other apps don't offer.

Great app, but needs some tweaks. Love it for little quick edits of some short videos on my phone, but because you can't use preset frame rates like 24fps for example or even the sheer size in the end though I want say, 1080p, I find myself not editing on a PC for longer videos or what I deem more significant. Shame when you realize this app has good potential. *EDIT* Well I just saw the update which includes 24fps... which is great.

This is a very powerful video editor. I've basically used it to edit my videos. It's very easy to duplicate clips, split clips and change its filters. I love this app. You can decide the output resolution too. I guarantee that this app performs most works Windows video editor apps cannot perform with ease. For example, you have to hold Alt key and then drag the clip in order to duplicate on Adobe Premiere Pro, which takes a lot of time. With this app, just one click. The processing speed is fast

The recent update of the app is draining the battery very fastly even during the editing phase. Previously it use to drain the battery during processing phase but not now even in the editing mode, it's draining the battery. I am using it on OnePlus 6 with 8 gb ram and 256 gb rom. Kindly solve this issue immediately otherwise it will be harmful for the mobile

I had downloaded several apps in search for an easy yet extended and advanced without having to rack my brain, spending hours only to figure out what works where and how. And #InShot has finally delivered me to that reality. I have had this for the same amount of time I had the other apps. But had not given it a shot till today. I doubt I'll be looking back from here. Although the ads are a pain!

comments: Very cool. There are two annoying features. One, the Disney effect includes an inset of the original picture. This limits it's usefulness if just the effect is wanted. It also the in the way of animation effects. At least, provide the option of removing it. Two, the basic effects should be clearly displayed and denoted at the beginning of the all effects before the variations and examples are displayed.

Tried it simply for my own amusement. Everything is perfect for a bit of goofing off, especially if you enjoy laughing at yourself. Even better for those of us that don't like having pictures taken of themselves. (I had to actually take a picture of myself in order to see what I would look like in those filters, I'm a no-pictures person.). ❤️ Ads are extremely minimal.

After trying this app a second time, it was a lot of fun. A lot of cool filters. The app had some issues with crashing but it seems likes it's normalized. Works best with unedited photos and you can add layers of filters on one picture, which was very cool. nice effects. i do recommend.

The game is nice.....infact for anything unique it us a nice game to toon urself into something new and trendy but a problem here is that there are so many ads and the effects I choose are not the real effects that are shown in the picture , I tried several times but the effects were not the true effects that were shown in the pictures , if possible kindly fix these 2 issues otherwise 3 stars...but a huge request to fix those issues....

The app is cool, the filters are amazing. However when it comes to Disney filter, it's cute and amazing but it's not that fun to use because you'll have a big circle with your face in it on the side of the filter, and that destroys the fun. I hope they'll remove that.

comments: DUDE!!!!! This is by far the absolute best app for photo editing. Most features are already pre-set so it makes it really easy to edit photos and look ANAZING in no time. It also saves right into your Google photos and let's you re post. The only bad thing is the price. At $30 ill probably be back to my old face in no time as soon as my trial ends. 😭😩

Great app! Clean and simple design. Gives amazing visual results which often look very natural. Had some good laughs at some filters. Freely available filters are good enough to try out the app, but the subscription model does not work for people that just want to make one good looking profile picture of themselves from time to time. I especially like their solution for temporary cloud storage. The images are encrypted using a key stored on the device only. Definitely worth a try! 😀

Generally I think this is a cool app and it definitely does what it's supposed to do. I do have two issues with it. 1. Sometimes the AI gets the gender wrong. Sometimes there's an option to correct it, but for me it's only available when it recognizes a woman as a man. If it mistakenly thinks a man is a woman, I just have to deal with that. 2. There used to be an option to use certain filters by watching an ad. This has been removed and now you have to buy the full version for that, which sucks.

It's really interesting to see what kind of makeup I like to recreate on here. All the filters are so flawless and cool looking especially the gender swap ones. The only thing is when you try the hair filters it seems to mess with the face a bit and give you makeup for long hair for some reason. Other than that it's awesome!

It's just a unique game.  while exercising your attention, sharpening your visual acuity, it improves your concentration.  This game is too much fun and quite entertaining.  The action framed by an adequate graphic layout.  A particularly flexible environment, structured to generate matches, tournaments, etc.  In fact the competition is stimulating and rather intense.  A fanned flame, shaped by the presence of online opponents, who are there to get all the differences before you do.

title: Google Photos
description:
Google Photos is the home for all your photos and videos, automatically organized and easy to share.

      - “The best photo product on Earth” – The Verge

      - “Google Photos is your new essential picture app” – Wired



    The official Google Photos app is made for the way you take photos today and includes essential features like shared albums, automatic creations and an advanced editing suite. Additionally every Google Account comes with 15 GB of free storage and you can choose to automatically back up all your photos and videos in High quality or Original quality. You can then access them from any connected device and on photos.google.com.



    With the official app, you get:



    FREE STORAGE: Back up 15 GB of photos and videos for free and access them from any device and photos.google.com—your photos are safe, secure, and private to you. All photos and videos you back up in High quality before June 1, 2021 will not count toward your Google Account storage.



    FREE UP SPACE: Never worry about running out of space on your phone again. Photos that are safely backed up can be removed from your device's storage in just a tap.



    SMART AUTOMATIC ALBUMS: Automatically get a new album with just your best shots after an event or trip, then invite others to add their photos.



    AUTOMATIC CREATIONS: Bring photos to life with automatically created movies, collages, animations, panoramas, and more from your photos. Or easily create them yourself.



    ADVANCED EDITING SUITE: Transform photos with a tap. Use intuitive and powerful photo editing tools to apply content-aware filters, adjust lighting, and more.



    SHARING SUGGESTIONS: With smart sharing suggestions, giving your friends the photos you took of them is painless. And they can add their photos, too, so you’ll finally get the photos you’re actually in.



    FAST AND POWERFUL SEARCH: Your photos are now searchable by the people, places and things in them — no tagging required.



    LIVE ALBUMS: Select the people and pets you want to see and Google Photos will automatically add photos of them as you take them, no manual updates needed.*



    PHOTO BOOKS: Create a photo book in just minutes from your phone or computer. You can also see suggested photo books based on your best shots from a trip or period of time.*



    GOOGLE LENS: Search the hard-to-describe and get stuff done, right from a photo. Copy and translate text, identify plants and animals, add events to your calendar, find products online, and more.



    SEND PHOTOS IN SECONDS: Instantly share photos with any contact, email, or phone number.



    SHARED LIBRARIES: Grant a trusted person access to all of your photos.



    You can also upgrade storage for your Google Account, used for Original Quality photos and videos by subscribing to Google One. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US. Pricing and availability can vary by region.

      - Google One Terms of Service: https://one.google.com/terms-of-service

      - One Google Pricing: https://one.google.com/about



    For additional help visit https://support.google.com/photos



    *Face grouping, live albums and photo books are not available in all countries.

recentChanges: We are introducing a new storage management tool to help you easily manage the photos that count toward your storage quota. This tool will surface photos or videos you might want to delete — like blurry photos, screenshots and large videos.
comments: In my opinion, Google could do much better on this app. For example, a very simple feature I think every photo app should offer is the ability to scan through all photos and find any duplicate copies. also, they should offer more free editing tools.. For example, sticker packs, photo frames or the ability to add text to your photo? I mean come on Google, get it together and step up your game.

Ive used photos for several years and loved it. Lately, my photos are backing up fine, but the feature to free up disk space on my phone no longer works - when I click on it, the app simply crashes. I tried all fixes I could find online and reached out to Google and got no response. It's a shame Google doesn't support its products better.

I hate this app. It has been stuck in a loop for a few weeks now trying to upload photos, driving me nuts. It organises everything into a million and one folders.I would much prefer to see things in one place or have the option to organise into folders myself. Used to have the album app on my old phone, sadly can't get it anymore. It was much better and easier to navigate. When I saved some stuff to sd card it messed everything up.

So easy to use and loaded with features. Great search capability, editing tools, utilities, sharing and storage options. Would be nice if it had a "healing" capability without having to use Snapseed or other editing apps. The "lens" feature is awesome. It uses artificial intelligence to identify text and objects both within images and in a live view from the camera. Couldn't live without it.

This app sucks. This started happening a couple days ago but whenever I want to watch a video there is no sound. I literally have to press the mute button to mute it then un mute it by pressing the button again in order to get sound! For. Every. Single. Video. I. Want. To. Watch. Google needs to fix this issue. Also, when I look back at my videos there would be big blocks of space where it says videos are but they are all black and don't play. It glitches out. So annoying. Wish I could write mor

title: Snapseed
description:
Snapseed is a complete and professional photo editor developed by Google.



== KEY FEATURES==

• 29 Tools and Filters, including: Healing, Brush, Structure, HDR, Perspective (see list below)

• Opens JPG and RAW files

• Save your personal looks and apply them to new photos later

• Selective filter brush

• All styles can be tweaked with fine, precise control



== TOOLS, FILTERS AND FACE ==

• RAW Develop – open and tweak RAW DNG files; save non-destructively or export as JPG

• Tune image – adjust exposure and color automatically or manually with fine, precise control

• Details – magically brings out surface structures in images

• Crop – crop to standard sizes or freely

• Rotate – rotate by 90°, or straighten a skewed horizon

• Perspective – fix skewed lines and perfect the geometry of horizons or buildings

• White Balance – adjust the colors so that the image looks more natural

• Brush – selectively retouch exposure, saturation, brightness or warmth

• Selective – the renown “Control Point” technology: Position up to 8 points on the image and assign enhancements, the algorithm does the rest magically

• Healing – remove the uninvited neighbor from a group picture

• Vignette – add a soft darkness around the corners like a beautiful, wide-aperture would do

• Text – add both stylized or plain text

• Curves - have precise control over the brightness levels in your photos

• Expand -  increase the size of your canvas and fill up the new space in smart ways with content of your image

• Lens Blur – add a beautiful Bokeh to images (background softening), ideal for photographic portraits

• Glamour Glow – add a fine glow to images, great for fashion or portraits

• Tonal Contrast – boost details selectively in the shadows, midtones and highlights

• HDR Scape – bring a stunning look to your images by creating the effect of multiple exposures

• Drama – add a hint of doomsday to your images (6 styles)

• Grunge – an edgy look with strong styles and texture overlays

• Grainy Film – get modern film looks with realistic grain

• Vintage – the style of color film photo from the 50’s, 60’s or 70’s

• Retrolux – go retro with light leaks, scratches, film styles

• Noir – Black and White film looks with realistic grain and the “wash” effect

• Black & White – classic Black and White look straight out of the darkroom

• Frames – add frames with adjustable size

• Double Exposure - blend two photos, choosing from blend modes that are inspired by shooting on film and by digital image processing

• Face Enhance – add focus to the eyes, add face-specific lighting, or smoothen skin

• Face Pose - correct the pose of portraits based on three dimensional models

comments: By far the best editing app I've used. The extra level of control that is not available in other apps is extremely useful. For example you can do certain effects to small areas that it automatically selects for you. The healing tool is also one of the best ones I've used. The lens blurs and HDR scape settings are also very handy. Very good, I would totally recommend.

Absolutely LOVE this app! It has really helped me with editing photos and such! One thing I would change though, is make more different fonts to use and make it so the text you write isn't on one big line, but rather on many lines. But overall it's an AWESOME app even for photography editing. You guys did an awesome job!!😊

Most of the time i am working on double exposure. And when i mistakely touch the back key, it directly discards everything. It is not like this on picsart or other apps. Everytime we press the back key, you should ask "do you really want to discard all of the work?" "Cancel" "Yes" But there is nothing like that here. So frustrating. Bye bye i'm switching to another editing app.

Great app overall, but it doesn't show the the picture as high quality as it actually is; photo quality degrades more easily when I zoom in in the app compared to the gallery app when exported, this makes it hard to edit and get the exact result I aspire. Also, there are only few filters. You can check mi gallery app to see how good their filters are. Manual healing option where we can choose the source with the section we are gonna apply and blur brush would do fine. Add denoise feature also.

This is a powerful, Excellent free photo editing app with ability for double exposures, local adjustments and a never ending array of edit combinations using just the grunge filters and local adjustments from the 'view edits' drop down menu. You can also import and save presets and it also supports Raw photo development. Great for beginner editors to advanced. Don't be fooled that this app is basic because it's free. It's an incredibly powerful and immensely enjoyable photo editing machine.

comments: I really was expecting better from this app. When I opened it there was no option to skip the subscriptions. Don't install this unless you want to waste your money on a photo editing app.

Not impressed at all. I cancelled the subscription straight away as my son put this on my phone, yet today almost 40 quid has been taken from my account. I'm a single parent and I don't work so this has really hit my finances hard. Please tell me how I can resolve this 😕

Complete package if the things could be added. The feature to add an area to convert into cartoon. Currently only to remove made available. Last but not least, the option to convert full body Egov could require minim size etc so it works properly

Please return the money you charge for subscriptions by offering a fake trial. If you just want money please create a charity app. Don't just put in generic reply begging for five star rating. You seriously don't deserve it.

The amount of free features is astounding. I love all the options. There are ads about every two minutes, but you can skip them after 5 seconds. And there's a watermark on your finished cartoon, but what do you expect for free?

title: Adobe Lightroom - Photo Editor & Pro Camera
description:
Adobe Photoshop Lightroom is a free, powerful photo editor and camera app that empowers your photography, helping you capture and edit stunning images.

Easy image editing tools like sliders and filters for pictures simplify photo editing. Retouch full-resolution photos, apply photo filters, or start photo editing wherever you are.

EDIT PHOTOS ANYWHERE
Edit and transform raw photos with one of the world’s most intuitive photo editing apps. Tap and drag sliders to improve light and color, apply filters for pictures, presets and more. Breathe life into your photo editing with leading photography tools.

Retouch light and color to make camera photos pop. Easy photo editor sliders let you control photo properties from your phone screen. 

Crop and Rotate tools find the right size and aspect ratio to best show off your camera work. Create clean camera shots with straight lines by adjusting perspective with powerful upright, guided upright, and Geometry sliders. 

Experiment with and compare photo edits without losing the original and pick your favorite look. 

Access all your presets anywhere. Image edits on one device are automatically applied everywhere else.

EDIT THE FINE DETAILS 
Finesse details with the advanced picture editor. Retouch and control images with selective adjustments. Remove almost anything with a touch of the Healing Brush. Local Hue Adjustments as part of selective edits alter hue and saturation precisely and elevate your photos. Have more control with advanced color grading and achieve stunning effects. Import your own graphical watermarks to add a personal touch.

Easy, guided tutorials from fellow photographers teach you to use this photo editor to its full potential.

LIGHTROOM PRESETS SIMPLIFY PHOTO EDITING:
Achieve pro photo editing faster with presets - filters for pictures. Simplify your photo editing, and access 70+ new hand-crafted presets with Lightroom Premium.
Combine presets to recreate your favorite photo effects perfectly every time with one click.

PRO CAMERA
The picture editor with unique camera controls to unlock your photography potential. Choose exposure, timer, instant presets, raw and more. Enjoy more control over your photography with camera capture modes like Professional and HDR.

SMART PHOTO ORGANIZATION
The photo editor harnesses Adobe Sensei AI to tag and organize photos based on the objects or people that are in them. A quick search for “mountains” or “Maria” will display all the relevant photos. Use handy organizational tools like ratings and flags to mark and group your favorite photos and see suggestions for the best ones. 

ADVANCED PHOTO SHARING
Group Albums let you invite others and collect everyone’s photos in one place. Share your work with users in the Discover section so they can see your creative process. Lightroom galleries showcase your photos online. Photo edits sync seamlessly so your changes are always up-to-date. Get inspiration from other creatives in the Lightroom Community and see personalized content with cool presets in your feed.

Follow your favorite photo editors, discover presets and get inspiration for your camera work.

EASY ADOBE CREATIVE CLOUD STORAGE:
The Lightroom image editor is the best cloud-based service for photography lovers.
Retouch full-resolution shots and have originals and edits backed up to the cloud, ready to access anywhere. Searchable keywords are automatically applied to sort photos without tagging.

*Full raw HDR capture mode is currently supported on devices that contain advanced processing and memory capabilities including but not limited to devices such as - Samsung S7, S7 Edge, S8, S8+, Note 8, Google Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 3, Pixel 3 XL, and OnePlus 5.

Fine Print
You must be 13 or older and agree to Adobe’s terms and privacy policy:
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree
http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree
Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

comments: I loved this app and it did so much for me. Two months ago it stopped working. It crashes every time I open it. If I can get it open it crashes the minute I click on a photo. I am so so frustrated with it and I have reinstalled and sent reports and looked up how to install the old version but can't find a way. I have a pixel 5g so I don't understand why it sucks so bad right now. Its making me unable to work. Maybe someone will respond to this and help me since I'm getting nowhere.

Great results; Frustrating to use. When I open a photo to edit, there can be a l o n g lag to get any of the operational panels to open, eg, pressing on the Light editing button, I can wait up to 2 full minutes to get the controls to open. Most of the time I just wait and use the pc program, but I often don't want to and being unable to edit on my phone is a major disappointment.

Everything works well and the editing is better than I expected. I use it daily the only thing that really needs to get fixed is the occasional crashing. I use my chromebook to edit and it crashes. I started using my phone and it crashes too so might want to take a look at that error code. If this gets fixed its easily 4 or 5 star app.

When you open evry new photo aleady added in lightroom , synced with all devices, it takes couple of second for the app to allow me edit the picture. I am using samsung m31s with 8 gb ram . And my 6 year old i phone SE opens each picture in no time. It is definetly mot the issue with the phone but the sofyware bug that delays it on android phone . Fix it you are a big company will appreciate that. Thanks

Does great, but wont let you bring in the same photo more than once to edit it. You have to edit, save it separately delete the copy on light room, just so you can have multiple edits of the same photo to compare. Takes alot of time when doing multiple. Just allow multiples, if I'm selecting the photos to import, dont "skip duplicate". I know what I want to do, you dont.

It doesn't recognize where things belong in a human face (though manually corrected, it's still not working). How to make a great app bad? Check out this one's history. From 5 stars to no star.

title: FreePrints – Print Your Photos for Free
description:
Print photos quickly, easily and for FREE with the world’s #1 photo printing app! 
No subscriptions. No commitments.™ Just free prints! 

Ordering your free prints couldn’t be easier. Just open the app and select photos from your phone, Facebook, Instagram and more. Then choose your quantities and you’re done! Your free prints arrive on your doorstep in just days – and all you pay is a small shipping charge. 

Order up to 85 FREE 4x6 photo prints a month. That’s 1,000 FREE prints a year! And order other sizes for next to nothing. We print your photos on your choice of deluxe glossy or premium matte photo paper. And at FreePrints® we only use Fujifilm photo paper for the best prints possible. 

We promise vivid color reproduction, brilliant whites and fade-free images. And with standard shipping and handling charges starting at just $1.99 (and never more than $9.99, regardless of order size), you simply can’t go wrong. 

What do I get for free? 
• Up to 85 4x6 prints per month – 1,000 per year 
• Limit 1 print per photo 

What do I pay for? 
• Additional 4x6 photo prints 
• Enlargements (We offer 5x5, 5x7, 8x10, 11x14, 12x18, 16x20 and 20x30) 
• Shipping and handling – Standard shipping starts at just $1.99 and never goes above $9.99, no matter how many prints you order 

Why is FreePrints so popular? 
• It’s the fastest, easiest and most affordable way to print photos from your phone or tablet 
• Choice of deluxe glossy or premium matte photo paper 
• Easily print photos from Facebook, Instagram, Dropbox, Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive 
• Print photos and get them delivered to your door in just a few days! 
• FreePrints is the world’s most trusted and best rated photo printing app 
At FreePrints we know how important it is to preserve life’s special moments. Having physical photos of your favorite memories means so much more than having them stuck on your phone. 

With more than 1,000,000 5 star reviews worldwide, our customers show us how much they truly love FreePrints!

What happens to my photos after you print them? 
We store your photos, in accordance with our terms of use, so that you can use them for other orders in the future if you wish, using FreePrints or our other apps. Your photos are always your photos; only you will have access to them. And we use best-of-breed security solutions to ensure that your photos are always protected. More specifics are available in our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

About FreePrints 
In a mobile world, all of our most important photos live on our phones and tablets, and yet there was never an easy way to get them printed. After one too many fights with USB sticks, photo kiosks and unreliable websites, we set out to solve this problem: Enter FreePrints. With just a few taps, you can select your favorite photos and have them headed straight to your mailbox. And best of all: They’re free! Millions of customers and countless stories later, we are honored to have touched so many lives. 

From our humble beginnings as a photo lab in Midland, Texas, we’ve grown FreePrints into the top-ranked photo printing app in the world. And if you like FreePrints, you’ll love our other apps: FreePrints Photobooks®, FreePrints Photo Tiles®, and FreePrints Gifts™, all providing free products for just a nominal delivery charge, with no subscriptions or commitments. 

Copyright © 2012-2021 PlanetArt, LLC. All rights reserved. FreePrints and the FreePrints logo are registered trademarks of PlanetArt, LLC.

With more than 1,000,000 5 star reviews worldwide, our customers show us how much they truly love FreePrints!

What happens to my photos after you print them?
We store your photos, in accordance with our terms of use, so that you can use them for other orders in the future if you wish, using FreePrints or our other apps. Your photos are always your photos; only you will have access to them. And we use best-of-breed security solutions to ensure that your photos are always protected. More specifics are available in our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

About FreePrints
In a mobile world, all of our most important photos live on our phones and tablets, and yet there was never an easy way to get them printed. After one too many fights with USB sticks, photo kiosks and unreliable websites, we set out to solve this problem: Enter FreePrints. With just a few taps, you can select your favorite photos and have them headed straight to your mailbox. And best of all: They’re free! Millions of customers and countless stories later, we are honored to have touched so many lives.

From our humble beginnings as a photo lab in Midland, Texas, we’ve grown FreePrints into the top-ranked photo printing app in the world. And if you like FreePrints, you’ll love our other apps: FreePrints Photobooks®, FreePrints Photo Tiles®, and FreePrints Gifts™, all providing free products for just a nominal delivery charge, with no subscriptions or commitments.

Copyright © 2012-2021 PlanetArt, LLC. All rights reserved. FreePrints and the FreePrints logo are registered trademarks of PlanetArt, LLC.
summary: Print up to 1,000 4x6 photos a year for FREE! No subscriptions. No commitments.
recentChanges:
Get 85 FREE 4x6 photo prints every month!
This release includes bug fixes and improvements.

Your suggestions and comments help make FreePrints even better, and we truly appreciate them! Keep sending your feedback to support@freeprintsapp.com.

It’s because of people like you that we can do what we do. If you had a great experience with FreePrints, please consider giving us a review.
comments: I really truly love this app, and I don't think I could say that about any other app lol. I try to take advantage of this awesome deal every month, but sometimes life gets busy and I forget. The months I do remember to claim my prints I am SO happy. Nothing beats having your favorite photos printed, in my opinion. The pictures are great quality, shipping is always fast and the app is very user-friendly. I recommend this app to all of my friends!

I was initially impressed. 85 free prints & i just paid shipping! Then after my first order, I had a pop up stating that I earned a free picture blanket. Awesome! We were so excited. I went through & added the 10 pictures & personalized the text. As the app was uploading the pictures, it popped up telling me it couldn't load. I tried to refresh, go back, nothing. So when I went back in to the app, the offer was gone. I contacted the company & they stated there was nothing they could do.

The makers of this app definitely kept their word when they said '100% free, no commitments...' and moreover, I never even had to enter my card credentials. I got my selected photos way earlier than the estimated span of time to receive the shipment! All in all, I ended up an exquisitely satisfied customer...keep up the superb work, "FreePrints", ill definitely recommend you to everyone! 👏👏👏✊✊✊🙏

I just got my free prints in today! We just had a little one, so lots of photos are being taken all the time, and it was nice to have a few printed for scrapbooks! Our budget is pretty tight, so getting free prints was a golden opportunity, especially combined with the free shipping on the first order!

at first I thought this was too good to be true, but it's not it's just true. I believe my first order was right around 30 pictures for like $3.10. prior to finding this app, I will go to Walmart and spend $0.21 a print. this is way cheaper than Walmart. also the quality of photo is very good

title: VSCO: Photo & Video Editor with Effects & Filters
description:
VSCO is a place where expression matters most.  We offer creative photo and video editing tools, inspiration, and a place for you to be you. Use our advanced filters, effects, and presets to increase your creativity, improve your pictures and reach your full potential. 

FREE PHOTO EDITOR
"• Take your photography to the next level with 10 free VSCO presets.
• Use editing tools like Contrast and Saturation to make your photos pop or use Grain and Fade to add texture and mimic analog film effects.
• Adjust or play around with your photo perspectives with Crop and Skew. 
• Save and recreate your favorite edits with Recipes.
• Easily apply filters to your pictures."

ADVANCED PHOTO EDITING TOOLS
"• Join VSCO Membership to access VSCO’s complete preset library with over 200+ presets.
• Recreate vintage film looks by Kodak, Fuji, Agfa, and others with Film X.
• Use advanced photo editing tools like HSL and Split Tone.
• Frame your images with a touch of color using Borders.
• Enhance your pictures with impressive effects."

VIDEO EDITOR
"• Transform your videos on mobile with the same premium VSCO presets and advanced editing tools from our photo editor.
• Adjust white balance and experiment with color control with HSL.
• Use smooth slo-mo effect to keep up with the latest trends online."

VSCO MONTAGE
"• Tell a video story and make a moving collage by layering videos, images, and shapes.
• Celebrate moments, illustrate a mood, or experiment with photos and videos you already have in your Studio.
• Adjust the opacity of any media layered in to create an eclectic range of customized gel colors and double exposures."

CONNECT WITH A CREATIVE COMMUNITY
"• Explore inspiring photos, videos, and editorial in Discover.
• Find people you know and connect with friends already on VSCO.
• Try something new with weekly photo Challenges exclusive to your VSCO membership."

SHARE WITH #VSCO
• Share your photos and videos with #VSCO for a chance to be curated by VSCO. We can’t wait to see what you create.

MEMBERSHIP TRIAL AND SUBSCRIPTION TERMS
Start your VSCO membership with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee. Your VSCO membership will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the trial period.

If you'd like help with any issues, please visit vs.co/help to submit a ticket.

Read more about our terms and conditions here —
https://vsco.co/about/terms_of_use

Read more about our privacy policy here —
https://vsco.co/about/privacy_policy

comments: I really like this app. There are great filters for my photos and a simple interface. However lately when I try to save photos, they're not straightened and instead tilted which is frustrating. There are other small bugs as well. After sending an email the team said they're aware of the problem but little else to help and no updates. I pay a subscription and use vsco often. I love the app but it would be great if these bugs could be fixed in a timely manner. I'd rather not move to another app.

The best app to add emotion and extra layer of feelings to any photo. My personal favorite photos editing app of all times. Have being usieng it ever since the earlier days of Lightroom filters. But there are still issues compares to the iOS version, I use both iOS and Android, the experience on Android is behind, I hope the developers haven't gave up on Android yet, please don't give up. As a long time pay user, I wish this app keep on going and get better with each update. Thank you VSCO.

I learned the hard way that VSCO doesn't save your studio edits after uninstalling the app. I didn't expect that my digital break would lead to that, I wouldn't have uninstalled it otherwise. I switched my phone & gallery saved VSCOs did not back up to Google Photos, meaning if I wanna continue usage, I start from the scratch I began 2 weeks ago. It makes sense to me now that unloaded drafts are discarded once the app is uninstalled, but the inconveniences could've been avoided if I was warned.

this app is good. had to come here to tell that VSVO for Samsung is not working for my samsung phone when it comes to editing my caption after i posted pic. i like to use vsco for samsung because it doesnt make my pic crack when i import the pic however, the error i encountered either i want to delete or edit my post, is annoying. had to do that using the original vsco, not the vsco for samsung. hope you can fix it.

This app used to be really good, I haven't been able to import an image for about 2 months now. Whenever I've spoken to customer service; they've advised they're aware of the issues and told me to try alternative importing methods despite how I said no method works...there's weekly updates or whatever but none of them fix this. Teach your customer service to think instead of using scripted replies 100% of the time, they're frustrating and negate fixing any issues.

title: Background Eraser
description:
◇ This is an application for cutting pictures and for making a picture's background transparent.

◇ The resulting images can be used as stamps with other apps to make a photomontage, collage.


☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆

☆ "Auto" mode ☆
・Erase similar pixels automatically.

☆ "Extract" mode ☆
・Select and erase objects which you want to remove accurately, by using blue & red markers.

☆ it's very important to make a picture's background transparent accurately
if you want to superimpose photos and make good composite photos.

By using this app, you can do it better.

comments: This is the best app for making stickers. Definitively. It has only unintrusive ads displayed on the bottom of the app that youll forget even exist, and occasionally an ad after completing an image. The only thing that has interrupted my use of this app is being asked to review it, which I gladly want to do! This combined with LINE camera is the best way I've found to make collages with images cut out perfectly and painlessly, with barely any advertising BS. Whoever made this deserves a medal.

This app is the best. It's been a year I'm using this but I have a problem. When I select the image from my gallery, it keep saying "Unfortunately, background eraser has stopped". I tried to clear cache, clear data and force stop on my Android but it's still popping on my screen! I have no choice or option. Please fix this!

I used to use the crop feature in another photo editing app (i still do for actual edits) but this app has shaved down the time it takes to remove the backgrounds of pictures by an insane amount. For the purpose of removing backgrounds this app is amazing. Multiple tools to use so you dont have to manually remove everything. I'd recommend it to anyone, thank you creators.

It's a very efficient app, very easy to use and to the point. If the function of select similar (like in photoshop) can be added, like if we need to remove a particular colour fron whole photo, select that colour with dropper..... Select similar..... Erase.... So all the area with that particular colour will become transparent, that would take the app to next level.... Hope I am not wishing too much .. ;-)

I was very limited in the selection of band logos that had a clear background to use making wallpapers for bands with my image editor. Not anymore. Now i can make wallpapers for any band i want. And this app works so good, every funtion works perfectly. I can even make digital picture frames out of any image i choose. This is the greatest app to pair with your picture editor.

title: Amazon Photos
description:
All Amazon Photos customers have 5 GB full-resolution photo and video storage. Personalize your Fire TV and Echo Show to display your favorite memories. Order photo prints, custom gifts, and home décor directly from your phone to make gift giving a breeze. You can opt to remove photos and videos stored in your phone to free up space, knowing your photos and videos will remain safe—now and in the future. 

Take advantage of features like This Day to see and share photos from this date in years past, and Memories, to automatically see curated slideshows from trips and other special moments from your life. Use invite-only Groups to gather and share a multitude of top-quality photos and albums with friends and family. 

FULL-RESOLUTION STORAGE
Amazon Photos keeps your photos and videos the same size and format as the originals. With full-resolution storage, your prints look as sharp as the day you took them. 

PERSONALIZE YOUR FIRE TV AND ECHO SHOW
So many photos and videos captured remain tucked away in a phone or camera. Device personalization means your best memories stay where they belong: in the spotlight. Whether it’s your Fire TV in the living room, or your Echo Show on the kitchen counter, your memories get the attention they deserve.

PRINTS
High-quality prints, made to order. Best of all? You can make it happen right from the app and transform those memories into prints, custom gifts, and home décor. Available only in the U.S.

THIS DAY
View (and share) photos from this date in years past, whether it’s one year ago or five years ago. 

MEMORIES
Your special moments set to music and re-surfaced as a curated slideshow to re-live the good times. 

PRIVACY
Share photos and albums with friends and family by inviting them to a private Amazon Photos Group. Consolidate photos of special events (vacations, playoffs, parties, graduations) into a single album. Group members can add a multitude of photos to an album or just sit back and take in the view.

FEATURES
- Prime:  Prime members have unlimited photo storage and 5 GB video storage, refined search filtering, and free prints delivery
- Storage:  Free 5 GB photo and video storage
- Full-resolution:  Keep your original image’s resolution: more pixels equal better quality photos and videos
- Personalization:  Keep photo memories on view instead of tucked away in a phone or camera
- One-stop shop:  Photo storage, prints, and sharing
- Prints:  Favorite memories transformed into photo prints, custom gifts, and home décor. Available only in the U.S.
- Built-in security:  Back up photos and videos automatically just by turning on with Auto-Save
- Alexa:  Take, view, and share photos hands-free
- Groups:  Privately share selected photos, videos and albums with friends and family across devices
- Subscriptions:  Expand storage with flexible monthly and annual plans starting at $1.99

recentChanges: - General bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I find this app to be awesome. I use Amazon Photos because they upload the photos I take automatically to the cloud where I can view them from any device. Works great with Amazon Fire. I can edit photos and share them with a group of friends as an album. To many great features to share. I've been using for over 5 years and haven't had any problems at all. Rarely do I give it but Amazon Photos deserves a solid 5 Stars!

Launches itself and runs in the background. Uploads pictures almost immediately before you can edit them, move them to the location you want, or even decide if you want to keep them. It's almost impossible to find the pictures I want because it's all one list. Why doesn't it organize by folders? I shouldn't need to go through all couple thousand pics and put them into "albums" when they've already been organized.

Sorting, albums, search are all far behind of anything current organizing and storage applications would provide. If I click into an album, it opens an entry album, saying there is nothing in there. Sorting allows by attributes such as "date uploaded" and "date taken", which is more than Amazon Drive offers, but that's a whole different (worse) level of insufficient. No extra features. Family Vault is not explained properly, I wonder how usage count of that is.

Particularly beneficial now Google photos are introducing a 15gb limit. Also, the photos are saved in the original resolution. Searching for particular photos is good too. In most cases you are given the option of deleting a photo from the cloud and/or from your phone as well. It's possible to view your photos on an Echo Show or similar.

Needs a ton of improvements that one might use for the betterment of the photos taken. Tech is making cameras better. Amazon Photos should follow. I use some Amazon Photos features to go along with my personal phone features, at times. It sometime enhances and it sometimes makes photos look awkward. Not good but, I give it a 4-star rating because I have an extra memory bank and I can print photos with only a request. That's a plus

title: Collage Maker - Photo Editor & Photo Collage
description:
Just select several pictures, Photo Collage Maker & Editor instantly remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. Unleash your creativity in our photo lab! It’s completely free!

Features:
● Combine up to 18 photos to create pic collage.
● 100+ Layouts of frames or grids to choose from!
● Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from!
● Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage.
● Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style.
● Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text.
● Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram.
● Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to social apps.


📷 Grid
Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom photo grid size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.

📷 Edit
All-in-one photo editor provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate...

📷 Freestyle
Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a scrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

📷 Story Template
100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper… Have fun with this Insta story maker, share your most memorable moments with friends.

📷 Multi-fit
Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose multiple ratios, 1:1, 4:5, 3:2 ratios, etc. Easily post entire photo with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time.

About our permissions:
Collage Maker asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos/videos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

Collage Maker is the best photo collage maker, pic stitch and photo editor for Instagram and printing. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photostudio.feedback@gmail.com

comments: So I decided to down load this to make my own wallpapers, I was kinda disappointed where you had to buy a lot of the things. There is like a subscription. (Not a one time payment.) I am easily able to make my own wallpapers though which is nice. There are no pop up ads. But even though there is a subscription for a lot of stuff, there are still ads that you have to watch for other things. Like, what? They are trying to rack in the money. I wouldn't recommend doing the subscription. Not worth it.

I'm sorry, I don't see how this app has 4.9 stars. I couldn't use it because at the slightest touch of a photo, it would go crooked. I spent 20 minutes trying keep the 4 photos in my collage straight because anytime I tried adjusting their size, they would also go crooked. PLEASE add an option to choose to keep photos straight. Also, not to sound callous but most of the templates are so poorly designed, it's as if there was no planning or thought process put into them but just thrown together

Just got it by accident (I thought it was one I'd previously used), and have only used it for one collage but so far I LOVE IT! I have a lot of photo (and video) editing apps/software and was just looking to combine 2pics for Instagram bc they don't make creativity outside of their 1:1 box😉 very easy; it not only does that but (from the looks of it) a whole lot more, and in a really easy way! I don't often do "I just got this" reviews - only when I'm very pleasantly surprised. Which I am!

Haven't used it long yet, but so far it's easy with a lot of options. Would love a wider range of fonts, but the design possibilities for altering the fonts (such as borders, backgrounds, shadows, etc) are great! Ad system isn't a problem so far on the free version. 5/5

Very good app I like it, but may be you can more improve it so we can choose our own wallpaper from our gallery. But it still good to me because it can help me make my homework like art, poster and make some digital college.Anyway it still very useful and easy. Thanks

title: YouCam Perfect - Best Photo Editor & Selfie Camera
description:
YouCam Perfect is the best selfie photo editor & beauty camera app with over 
 800 MILLION downloads and counting!  Download YouCam Perfect for all the photo editing tools & beauty camera you need – face retouch, photo effects, camera filters, amazing collages, fonts, stickers, frames, animated effects and more! The best part? It is a free app! 😍

Save photos to your cloud backup and access them across multiple devices. Take sweet selfies and get creative with YouCam Perfect to turn your pics into masterpieces!

🤳Take Perfect Pictures and Edit Selfies in Seconds
◇ Beautify selfies in just one tap: Whitening teeth, smooth skin, reshape faces; our adjusting tools take your selfie to the next level!
◇ Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples and unwanted spots with the tap of a finger.
◇ Use live photo editor effects to instantly take awesome snaps or record videos in one tap

📱Amazing Collages, Frames & Effects
◇ Find the amazing collage or frame for your favorite picture, try photo grid, freestyle collage, scrapbook for photos.
◇ Create your best selfie with fine-tune filters and effects to level up your pics
◇ Customize your snaps with stylish photo grid or aesthetic templates to share on Facebook, Instagram and your favorite social networks
◇ Enhance colors with trendy effects on your photos to WOW your friends

✨Animated effects make your photos shine!
◇	Let your creativity run free with tons of animated effects, overlays, and animation tools. 
◇	Create amazing effects from live images and transform each picture into a magical work of art using incredible filters and effects.
◇	Added new sparkle filters for images & live cam that will engage your followers and wow your friends

🖌Magic Brush & Layers
◇ Magic Brush adds a burst of shapes and colors for picture magic on the go
◇ Turn your pictures into masterpieces with airbrush color brushes that match every skin tone
◇ Layer up multiple images, stickers, and text to create awesome pics
◇ Create art & illustrations from airbrush or just draw something inspiring for fun.

☑️Photo Backgrounds & Object Remover
◇ Cut out the subject of a photo, then give it an aesthetic new background

title: Adobe Photoshop Express：Photo Editor Collage Maker
description:
PHOTO FUN FOR EVERYONE
Tap into your creativity on the go with Photoshop Express–a fun, fast, and easy picture editor for one-touch transformations and photo edits–used by millions of creative individuals. Make pro-looking images with an easy-to-use digital studio on your mobile device.

Photoshop Express delivers a full spectrum of tools and effects at your fingertips. Personalize your experiences with sticker makers, enhance color gradients and imagery, create pic collages, generate memes, make quick fixes and heighten your share-worthy moments.

PERSPECTIVE CORRECTION 
Instantly fix crooked images and correct distorted camera angles. 

REMOVE NOISE
Smooth graininess, reduce color noise, and sharpen details to make your photos look their best.

APPLY BLUR
Use radial blur to blend out backgrounds and shift focus to specific subjects or full blur to create movement.

PERSONALIZE WITH STYLE
Customize images with the sticker maker, create memes and captions, style your text with a wide array of fonts and layouts, add borders and frames, and stamp creations with custom watermarks.

CHOOSE FROM HUNDREDS OF LOOKS, EFFECTS AND FILTERS FOR PICTURES
Dehaze pictures to remove fog in a scene, apply dramatic filters for pictures, and easily slide to adjust color temperature, vibrance and other color effects.

ASSEMBLE STUNNING PIC COLLAGES
Create professional-quality compilations by adding ready-to-use photo grid layouts and modifying borders and colors.

SPOT HEALING
Easily reduce blemishes and spots from selfies and portraits.

QUICK FIXES
Automatically adjust contrast, exposure and more with one-touch adjustments; easily crop, straighten, rotate for eye-catching layouts, and magically remove red-eye and pet-eye from your favorite moments.

QUALITY PHOTO IMPORT AND SHARING
Upload images from multiple sources and formats (including raw and TIFF), posting your favorites directly to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Flickr and other social platforms or share them in email, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Signal, and Line to inspire others.

Make photo magic happen with the Photoshop Express picture editor from Adobe - proud makers of the Photoshop family. Create fun, shareable memes, personalized pic collages and stickers.  

Adobe Terms of Use:
You must be 13 or older and agree to Adobe’s terms and privacy policy.
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree
http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree

Do not sell my information: www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights

• Watermark resize – Have complete control over the size of the watermark on your images. A much requested functionality, humbly delivered!

comments: I've been using this for free for years because it's not worth paying for. The fact that you want $5/month or $35/year for basic features like being able to save your photo at 100% quality is BS!!! I am uninstalling all Adobe products I have on my phone because this company has no idea how to run a business and there's no idea the actual value of their product. FYI you're not worth $35 a year for this app!

Loved this app... Used it literally for years. Best photo editor available. Recently, I had to get a new phone. NOW Adobe wants $35/yr to use the app where you can make changes and save them! It's Photoshop EXPRESS for cryin' out loud! Reputation and respectability for this company/developer in my book have fallen by the wayside. I can't even open pdf files in the acrobat reader. I'll use Pixlr for image editing instead. Very disappointed.

Great for iOS but not for Android. iOS has text styles organized by themes such as memes which is nice, but more importantly, it had the ability to add stroke to text so it stands out against multicolored backgrounds, a huge feature that seems to be missing in the Android version. Would love to see better text theme organization and having text stroke added.

Out of the blue, it is refusing to open. I shall uninstall and reload to see if that sorts it out. Now done. It is opening occasionally, but not from another app (which it used to do without issue). Just like Photoshop itself, what was fine becomes a pain in the neck with an update.

I've used this app for nearly 3 years now and it's always been free. Now I can't use the FREE options anymore, you have to pay for them even though they've been FREE for 3 years. What a great way to rip off customers, taking away what little they already had. Used to love this app and use it almost daily. Now I have no editing app. Seems a lot of people feel this way.

Extremely easy to use. However, ad overkill.
Good features. Exactly what I was looking for. Don't even mind all the ads since they're short and the app works/has everything I need laid out clearly and easy.

I would have given more stars had there not been so many ads, so often so, I was forced to sit and wait until they were done. Had it only been here and there, ok, but every other touch of the screen, the whole time was a little extreme!

title: B612 - Best Free Camera & Photo/Video Editor
description:
B612 is the best all-in-one camera & photo/video editing app. We offer various free features and tools to make every moment more special.
Meet trendy effects, filters, and stickers that are updated every day!

=== Main features ===

*Create your own filters*
- Create a one-of-a-kind filter and share it with friends
- No problem even if it's your first time creating a filter. Filters are easily completed with just a few touches.
- Meet the creative and diverse filters of B612 creators.


*Smarter CAMERA*
Apply real-time filters and beauty to capture every moment as your pic of the day.

- Don't miss out on daily updated AR effects and seasonal exclusive trendy filters
- Smart Beauty: Get a perfect recommendation for your face shape and create your custom beauty style
- AR Makeup: Create a natural look from daily to trendy makeup. You can adjust beauty and makeup to suit you.
- Shoot clearly anytime, anywhere with high-resolution mode and night mode.
- Capture the fun moment with the Gif Bounce feature. Create it as a gif and share it with your friends to double the fun!
- From video shooting to post-editing with over 500 kinds of music. Turn your daily life into a music video.

*ALL-IN-ONE PRO editing feature*
Enjoy basic, professional-grade tools for free

- Various Filters & Effects: From retro to emotional modern style! Create the atmosphere you want.
- Advanced Color Edit: Experience precise color edit with tools such as professional curves, split tone, and HSL that brings out details.
- More natural portrait edit: Complete your pic of the day with beauty effects, body edit, and hair color styling.

- Borders and Crop: Simply adjust the size and ratio and upload it to social media.
- Decoration Stickers & Texts: Decorate your photos with various stickers and texts! You can also make custom stickers and use them.
