title: Remini - Photo Enhancer
description:
Remini makes old, blurred or low quality photos taken with old cameras or mobile phones to high-definition and clarity.

Remini engages state-of-art AI generative technology to bring professional film production level image enhancing and restoration technologies to our daily life. 

Since Remini launched in the beginning of 2019, more than tens of millions photos – low resolution, blurred, compressed and damaged – have been enhanced.

-------- Amazing features ----------------
• Remini can enhance old photos and low quality photos to high-definition.
• Remini can enhance photos taken with old cameras or mobile phones to like with up-to-date cameras or mobile phones.
• Remini can repair blurred photos to clarity.
• Remini is capable of repairing blurred videos, allowing you to play back previously captured videos with a clear picture on a larger display device.
• Remini also provides more AI-related image processing functions, waiting for you to discover.

comments: HELLO! This app is actually good and I never review things so that must mean something. The enhancements it did to some of my pictures was very surprising. My original images would be super grainy and blurry but this app would make it to where I could literally see individual hairs of people's mustaches, eyebrows, and eyelashes, not to mention the great amount of detail that came out of eyes. No idea how the app is able to do this. Seriously just try it out on a grainy picture of someone's face

It's still not working. Everytime I try to enhance a photo, it says "Network Request Timeout (0)" and it wont let me do anything. I tried to reinstall it, but then I could not even sign in to my account because of this error. I hope you guys fix this FAST. I will change my review to 5 stars after the app is fixed because this was the BEST photo enhancer that I am using.. well I "was" using.

I can actually see my great-grandfather instead of a blurry old photo. I wish it could enhance the rest of the photo, not just the face. The color feature needs a lot of improvement. It just turns sections of the picture orange and that's it. Also, I wish there was a no eyelashes option. It keeps giving people thick full eyelashes where there aren't any.

At first I loved using it. But as the days pass by, Everytime I tried to enhance some photos I couldn't because it always says network timeout. Really? I have a stable network connection and then it'll always says network timeout? Please fix this problem so that everyone can enjoy the best quality. Personally I loved it. It's just this thing happen that's why I rate only one star.

At first I enjoyed this app because literally it's amazing!! But suddenly NETWORK ERROR pops out, so I try to update but still doesn't work. I hope you guys fix this issue. But if this issue has been fixed, I can guarantee that this app is worth it!!

title: Lensa: Photo Editor for Perfect Pictures
descriptionHTML:
Lensa is a photo editor for selfies and photo retouching. The app has many filters for pictures to get a sweet selfie, remove any blur background or do any other necessary editing. With its simple features, you get an easy-to-use red eye corrector and can make every photo perfect 365 days a year. Capture memorable moments with the picture editor and do the necessary photo editing to freeze each moment in time. You don't need a photo lab or dark room because within seconds your peachy selfie is ready.

SKIN REFINING FEATURES FOR THE PERFECT YOU

Editing pictures has never been easier with the skin editor feature that allows you to make each photo clearer, remove makeup, or apply any other beauty filter you choose. Put the focus on your body where you choose.

- You don't have to be a pro to use the app. The Auto-Adjust feature will make your life easier, so you only need to focus on taking the photo;
- Different features make it possible to edit all blemishes so you have the best effects;
- Adjust your selfie to let it stand out or use the portrait feature for something more traditional;
- Lensa also has an acne remover that you can use to edit photos.
- Specify the retouch feature you want and Lensa does the rest.

SHOW YOUR TRUE SELF WITH THE EYE CORRECTOR FEATURE

Your eyes are the windows to your soul, so let them shine. Lensa makes this easy with its red eye remover that adjusts each eye according to your choice. There is also an eyebrow feature to enhance contours on your face or do other changes the way you want.

- Be in full control of your eyebrows and shape them how you want with the eyebrow editor;
- Adjust dark circles around your eyes or remove eye bags to get the best version of yourself;
- Easily revert to the original photo to make new modifications.

SHOW YOUR TRUE SELF IN EVERY SHOT

Camera apps come and go, but with Lensa it's not just another fad. It's top-notch features allow you to express yourself with high-quality photography that is ageless, special, and unique. You won't need to rely on your smartphone camera to get this done, because Lensa can do all the edits you can imagine.

- Lens correction adjusts all picture effects to get the perfect shot;
- Use the constrast feature to adjust lighting and touch up any blur photo;
- Be funky, choosing the style you want to change hair color and show the perfect smile with the flawless teeth whitener feature.

BACKGROUND EDITOR SO EASY TO USE YOU'll NEVER WANT TO USE ANOTHER APP

- Backgrounds can be tricky, but Lensa is about making complex things easy. You can easily blur the background to put the focus on your special moment;
- Background changer feature to add motion to your selfie;
- Use the portrait mode as a photo enhancer to fade unwanted background effects.

EXTRA FEATURES

Lensa has a wide range of features and offers you the chance to express yourself through photography. Other editing apps may provide similar features, but Lensa gives you the power of editing choice.
- Color intensity to jazz up photos that have bad lighting;
- Numerous photo filters to edit pictures until you are satisfied;
- Selfie editor to tune up each photo before posting to your favorite social media;
- Temperature tool to modify the look and feel of each photo;
- Block out unwanted details with fade effect feature;
- Handy saturation feature to add character to each selfie;
- Sharpness tool to correct blurry photos caused by shaking;
- Different tints to match your style and personality.
summary: Top photo editor app. Retouch photos, add filters for pictures and more
developerAddress: 440N Wolfe Rd, Sunnyvale, California 94085, United States of America

comments: I'm a photographer, so I just gave this a try out of curiosity. There are many sliders/controls and options, which is great, but the overall effect is not good. Skin smoothing is not realistic at all. Even with all the tweaks available, it's a no.
pretty good app. there are a lot of options for editing, but would like a little more options for the backdrops and filters/effects. Plus side is you can upload your own image for a backdrop.

once your free edits finish, you're given the opportunity to obtain more free edits IF YOU SHARE THEIR APP VIA LINK I did that and never got mine I emailed the developers and all they did was bombard me with questions , dancing around the real issue. After that, I still didn't get my edits. Thanks for wasting my time.
Works quite well EXCEPT there is no ability to adjust the outline of the cutout foreground. Need to be able to erase and/or redo edges.
Of all my photo apps, this has the most valuable features that I use most often. I can improve the quality of a photo the fastest on this app than any other.

comments: It's a pretty basic filter app, which works fine in it's free version. When first installing and running the app, you need to be careful to hit the X in the top left of the screen, because it immediately tries to sub you to the pro version. Once exiting from that screen, it can take up to 10 mins for the app to load all the effects and filters. This can give you the impression that the app is broken. All D3D effects were broken (Angel Wings you see in ads), constant errors.

It works poorly on Android. Constant crashing, lagging, taking long time to load, crashing while trying to save a picture. Now it doesn't show images when picking images from the gallery, it's all white and gray squares. Filter images don't load either. The worst thing is that no one cares. Very upsetting. I've had a very bad experience with this app, although the filters are great. Fix the android app. Android users deserve good things too.

This was a really good and easy app to use since the middle of 2021, I'm on an android and I find this app really easy to use.. the layout is simple, and so are finding out the controls, but I have been experiencing a lot of lag and crashing. I tried to make a video today and I just randomly shut.. I'm really disappointed and I hope you'll fix this soon!

It would probably be nice if it worked. One of the effects actually loaded but no other effects or filters did anything to photos. Maybe I did something wrong? I waited a long time for effects to show up but nothing. On android. I got a response to try a more recent version updated last week. But I downloaded the app like one hour ago so this is the stable version lol....

This app is ridiculous, 1st of all it only saved *1* photo of me after a year of me trying to edit photo's,2nd of all it takes 5 minutes for *1* filter and efect to load,3d of all you cant see any of the things where you have to adjust per example:i dont see brightnes, contrast and all of the other. 4Th of all i only have filter efects and adjust arent there supposed to be other things per example:trim. Yes i have an android galaxy a2 core but att other people its works please fix it!!!!!!!!!!!

title: PhotoScan by Google Photos
description:
PhotoScan is a new scanner app from Google Photos that lets you scan and save your favorite printed photos using your phone’s camera.
 
 Picture perfect and glare free
 
 Don’t just take a picture of a picture. Create enhanced digital scans, wherever your photos are.
 
 – Get glare-free scans with an easy step-by-step capture flow
 
 – Automatic cropping based on edge detection
 
 – Straight, rectangular scans with perspective correction
 
 – Smart rotation, so your photos stay right-side-up no matter which way you scan them
 
 Scan in seconds
 
 Capture your favorite printed photos quickly and easily, so you can spend less time editing and more time looking at your bad childhood haircut.
 
 Safe and searchable with Google Photos
 
 Back up your scans with the free Google Photos app to keep them safe, searchable, and organized. Bring your scans to life with movies, filters, and advanced editing controls. And share them with anyone, just by sending a link.

comments: It does what it's meant to at its core but it hardly enhances the photo, it changes it so bad you can't even do anything to edit it afterwards. Also it destroys the quality of my camera for some reason? I have the Samsung galaxy S20 and when it comes out through this app it looks like it was taken with a galaxy S3. App needs serious work and the ability to turn off "enhancing". I'd be much better off editing it myself.

Ok, I didn't understand how to scan at first. I thought I had to use my finger to move the dots but you use your actual phone to go to the dots. It will give you arrows for you to be able to move your phone over too of them. I looked at my original picture that I scanned and it did make a big difference to improve the picture. It was very cool. Wow, modern technology now a days... 😃

Several reviews have an extraordinarily high bar set for this app meant to scan printed photos. I am not surprised that this app can't produce better quality scans compared to the original of any new phone. Why would you need to scan a photo that new anyway? This app is a lifesaver, though, for people like me who began taking photos in 1975 and who has hundreds of printed photos in numerous albums with no way to search or sort. Hard to screw up the quality on pics taken 45 years ago!

Spectacular Slide scanning app. Pathetic support for Android. The Android version of Photomyne seriously lags iOS capabilities, after a year of using, still NO Update. WORST, there is NO integration between PhotoScan and Photomyne. Extremely disappointed in the manual effort I now need to invest to export & import images into Photomyne, to add my 1900 scanned slides into albums & add Details. 5 Stars for Scanning, 0 Stars for ANDROID SUPPORT. Very Disappointed USER.

Great app. Instantly can scan any printed old photo quickly in a few seconds. Quality is very good. Saves a lot of time compared to a scanner and results are comparable with my scanner. Scanned photos go directly to Google Photos app. I think you can improve the quality of the scan by adjusting the light and using the flash function or not. Also, quality may depend on how good your phone camera is.

comments: This is one photo editing app where you can really get creative and take it to the next level. Amazing with all kinds of different filters, effects and editing options.... A one of a kind photo editing app that can hold it's own....

This app used to work fine. All of a sudden it just stopped working. It doesn't save an edited photo. I tried do many times but it's not working anymore.
I don't know why but when I choose a filter it doesn't stay but I loved it 😭and if this problem was not it could be the best photo editor I've ever seen

description:
Just select several pictures, inCollage the best Photo Collage Maker & Photo Editor will instantly remix them into cool photo collage, photo grids or memes. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, frame, text and much more. It's completely FREE!

● Combine up to 20 photos to create pic collages.

📷 Meme Generator For Free
This photo collage maker is also a meme generator and meme maker. You can create the funniest memes with more than 50 fonts to choose from, and text color and size adjustment.

Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a wscrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

comments: This is THE BEST collage maker ever!!! I've been using collage makers for YEARS! At times it has been very frustrating trying to find a perfect app, with perfect layouts, with perfect editing options, and more! It's a HUGE relief to not be bothered by intrusive ads that force you to watch them! This one has set the bar unreachably high for the other "collage maker" apps out here. Thank you so much!! As soon as I realized how convenient this was, I uninstalled other apps REAL FAST. I'm so happy!

I tried what you suggested, it didn't work. And you responded thru no reply in my email, so I couldn't respond to your email! Just cancel it please!!!! I love this app but I'm giving it one star at the moment because after months of using it I decided to try the 7 day Free trial of Pro and now there isn't a way to cancel before they charge me. It says to cancel in the Google play app under subscriptions but it's not there only my other subscriptions. Like how am I going to cancel this????

I have to say, I am confused by the high rating this app gets. I have always used a different app, but, with my new phone, I figured I would try the 4.9 rated editor. There is nothing wrong with the app, I guess. Well, except that, right off the bat, they try to get a credit card number. But, the editing options are just the bare bones basic! No users guide, no instructions (I was hoping that I had just not figured the app out, yet), and you cannot even duplicate a color, when usung paint!

This is a great collage app but this still needs a lot of works to improve. Like in two photo collage, I hope I can blur out or edit the other one. The filter doesn't work. Also I hope you add lines when placing a text or an object in work just like in PicsArt so that it follows a certain placement in the picture.

Really enjoy using it. I have the free version and it has nice features. But of course the pro version looks like it has some really spiffy features. If I took more pics, I would definitely pay for the pro...maybe in the near future I will.

title: PhotoRoom - Background Eraser & Photo Editor
description:
PhotoRoom is the all-in-one app that edits, designs and optimizes great visual content that helps you run your business from your phone. Remove or erase the background of photos, use templates and create your own content. 

No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your photos into pro-quality content in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates to make it even easier. It's like having a whole photography and design studio in your pocket!


More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Official photos for your Passport, ID or Driver’s License
- Covers for Youtube, Instagram and Facebook
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc. 

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Make your own stickers in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, etc, you can optimize your business with features like the AI background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership. 

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to the full Pro backdrop & template library
- Export at higher resolutions
- Edit and export in batch mode
- Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

descriptionHTML:
PhotoRoom is the all-in-one app that edits, designs and optimizes great visual content that helps you run your business from your phone. Remove or erase the background of photos, use templates and create your own content.

No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your photos into pro-quality content in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates to make it even easier. It's like having a whole photography and design studio in your pocket!


More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Official photos for your Passport, ID or Driver’s License
- Covers for Youtube, Instagram and Facebook
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Make your own stickers in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, etc, you can optimize your business with features like the AI background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to the full Pro backdrop & template library
- Export at higher resolutions
- Edit and export in batch mode
- Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

developer: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
comments: I'm an online seller, so when I found out about this app I thought to myself, "this is going to save me a ton of time". First photo I uploaded was anklet. The app is supposed to remove the background so you can add a nice backdrop. You can't adjust how much of the original background is removed so you see bits of the original background on the new backdrop. It looks super janky. Waste of time. I'd rather do it myself by hand, looks more professional.

Love the app, however it keeps messing up my phone. I have a phone for just taking photo's for my business, so I don't have many apps on my phone. After I downloaded the app my phone started acting up. I had to factory reset my phone and downloaded the app again. It starts off great, but then after several uses it messes my phone up. Needless to say my phone is messing up again. So unfortunately I have to delete the app. I really do love the way my photo's turn out though.

This app would be ideal if it wouldn't cut off one hand or leave a small trash can, if it would've cut out BOTH hands/arms it would have been ok but it only took one of them, and it would NOT release the small trash can, it wasn't attached to the main part of the photo so I'm not sure why it kept doing it.

Trying to erase the background. The line keeps scrolling back and forth over the photo but never erases the background . I have trying stopping and restarting the app. I removed and reinstalled the app didn't help. Also why does parts of the photo show up almost "ghosted". I either fully remove or add the area, depending. Also if trying to remove a small area it's difficult to see. The zoom window is worthless, just gets in the way.

Very helpful app but not perfect. There were times that you surprise me with the result and then 3 out of 5 times I was wondering what the hell why you were not able to remove this and that? So please improve for the better.

comments: Very subpar. The other reviews already mentioned the excessive ads, so I won't bother commentingon that. What I will mention is that the "alterations" made to my image could have been made by a Adobe photoshop filter from 1999, and would still probably look better. My old age face just looked like the contrast was raised as well as the gradient to give a crusty look to my skin. I spent ten minutes with this app and I'm already ready to Uninstall it.

This app is the worst! The filters aren't even that clear, the old to younger filters are just horrible! But their is only one filter I like but still this is a not good face editing app, and also if it's the whole concept of gender swapping? Then why do we have to have PRO? This is mind bonding.

An ad every 30 seconds, not even overexaggerating. You can change your age for free and make yourself look like a cartoon but thats it. Young 1 and the one that makes you older are both inaccurate. The gender swap is paid and thats the good one that i wanted. You could at least make it so you can watch an ad to use it.

Way too many ads. Also almost everything in there is for Pro. And Pro is what you need for the "full experience" of the app. They want to charge you $15 a month for this app. It's garbage. Unless you really like apps like these you shouldn't get it. I got it just to test it out. Before I got stopped by an ad 10 seconds in. And there's no way I'm paying a subscription. That's why I removed and uninstalled this app. It's not good. Do not download. They also reply the same message to everyone.👎

Very long ads! I do understand the need for ads to create revenue but the number of pop-up ads without a timer or anything is so frustrating. The gender swap is premium only. It's not all bad, so 3*. I played with one photo, changed it maybe 3 times, had to watch about 10 ads for that and uninstalled. You gotta do some more work on that app, guys.

title: Motionleap - Photo Animator by Lightricks
description:
Animate your photos on the go! Intuitive 3D picture editor with filters and loads of other unique features!

Photo animation and editing are made easy with Motionleap (formerly Pixaloop) by Lightricks (the developer behind Lightleap, Videoleap, Facetune, Photoleap, and others), chosen as one of Google Play’s Best Apps of 2019! Motionleap is part of the Creative Kit (previously Enlight). Animate and edit photos with the Creative Kit’s amazing photo editing tools!

Motionleap is a PRO photo editor app for everyday users! It offers everything you need to edit a picture on the go. Includes an array of stylish effects, filters, and tools to help you create a stunning image, using amazing 3D live image filters and effects. With Motionleap, you can directly post your photo artwork to Facebook, Instagram, etc. Skyrocket your creativity, and edit any picture with just a few taps!

Motionleap Key Features: 

Animation creator with intuitive arrows sets photo motion direction
Background changer with stunning filters
Animation effects for pictures with overlays, sparkles, and more
Picture effect editor for making all necessary 3D photo adjustments
A wide variety of automated sky backgrounds resembling timelapse

Easily Create 3D Photos
 
Edit pictures into animated 3D photos: use arrows to add movement, choose the speed and replace the background. Picture effect tools using artificial intelligence make it easier than ever to define entire areas of a picture or fine-tune for more control.

Add Unique Overlays and Effects

Motionleap makes it easy to add unique overlays and effects to still images that will engage your followers and wow your friends. Whether you want to create a professionally finished animation or simply add fun effects to your pictures, you can do it all with Motionleap. 

Motionleap brings life to images, creating animation picture and cinematographic effects that will wow everyone, from your friends to your followers. And,best of all, it’s a free picture animation app and editor! Animate pictures and add 3D picture effects to watch your still image come to life as incredible videos that boomerang back and forth or flow like a GIF.

Photo Effect Creator 

Highlight your image with amazing picture effects. With a powerful and intuitive application at your fingertips, watch as each picture becomes a live 3D picture with the help of amazing filters and effects that will bring out your inner creative genius. With Motionleap, you can enjoy the ease of one-touch smooth transformation and 3D photo animation that brings your creations to life. 

Creative Photo Editor

Add awesome effects to your images with the creative photo editor. Start your photo editor adventure with a wide range of filters and effects at your fingertips. Use the image brush photo editor tool to create perfect effects for your live 3D picture.

Your Digital Masterpiece

Motionleap allows you to easily edit images with artistic, powerful, precise, and easy-to-use 3D picture animation tools. Use the picture editor to revolutionize your images with a real-time editor that lets you create mesmerizing art in a moment. Motionleap lets you create and edit moving photos with easy and powerful editing tools including background changer, 3D Live, 3D motion, picture overlays, editor effects, filters, and more.

Unlimited Photo Editor & Animation Creations

Let your creativity run free with tons of fun effects, overlays, and animation tools. Create amazing effects from live images and transform each picture into a magical work of art using incredible filters and effects.  

Need animation inspiration? Look for #Motionleap to get in on the social media trend and start sharing pictures! Share your 3D photos, tag your creations and we’ll feature the best ones. Share animated pictures and take the next step for your social feed!

Terms of use: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.pdf
Privacy policy: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf

recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: I like this app and I paid for the full 1-year subscription. I was told can cancel the auto-renewal and keep using the app til the end of my subscription. Problem is now I can not use all the features and still asks me to go for the Pro version which I have already paid for 1 year use! Please advice what to do or fix the problem as I should not be the only one having this issue? Update: Issue fixed, Now working by click the "buy 1-ÿr sub"".

I'm happy with the app, but like many other pro subscribers, my videos become low quality and pixelated when uploading to Instagram and Facebook, even when saved in high quality or medium quality. There haven't been updated features in a while, so I've been using other apps. Disappointing because i used to use this app for everything. Also wish the sky feature could be applied to the whole photo, not just where the app detects a sky. Used to be a solid 5 stars :(

Overall a pretty good app. Nice for making videos out of pictures, but uses way too much space on your phone. Could be a 5 star app but there's no option to move the storage to an SD card if the user uses one (rare I know). I have 128g of storage on my Note 20 Ultra (and a micro SD w/ 256g) and this app killed all my phone storage with the editing 7 pictures with no access to the SD. How this app is now; you have to get all the use out of an image and then delete the project to save space.

I absolutely hate to give this app a 1 star when it has so much potential. It keeps crashing within minutes of me opening it before I can edit anything lately. It has done this 9 times in a row today alone. Even before it started doing this it was not exporting my videos either. It would just say 0% for over 5 minutes before I would get fed up and close the app. The pictures/vids I made are beautiful, but what's the use if I can't export them or even access them?

Such a good app! It takes a bit of practice to learn everything but is well worth learning. Sure, there are premium features, but you can still make awesome loops without them. The only thing I would ask is that the anchor could have a way so you can make a shape that surrounds a shape, so if you wanted to make water flow around a rock, you don't have to put a million anchors on the rock. Other than that, such a good app!

title: Open Camera
description:
Open Camera is a completely free Camera app. Features:
* Option to auto-level so your pictures are perfectly level no matter what.
* Expose your camera's functionality: support for scene modes, color effects, white balance, ISO, exposure compensation/lock, selfie with "screen flash", HD video and more.
* Handy remote controls: timer (with optional voice countdown), auto-repeat mode (with configurable delay).
* Option to take photo remotely by making a noise, or by voice command "cheese".
* Configurable volume keys and user interface.
* Upside-down preview option for use with attachable lenses.
* Overlay a choice of grids and crop guides.
* Optional GPS location tagging (geotagging) of photos and videos; for photos this includes compass direction (GPSImgDirection, GPSImgDirectionRef).
* Apply date and timestamp, location coordinates, and custom text to photos; store date/time and location as video subtitles (.SRT).
* Panorama, including for front camera.
* Support for HDR (with auto-alignment and ghost removal) and Exposure Bracketing.
* Support for Camera2 API: manual controls (with optional focus assist); burst mode; RAW (DNG) files; slow motion video; log profile video.
* Noise reduction (including low light night mode) and Dynamic range optimisation modes.
* Options for on-screen histogram, zebra stripes, focus peaking.
* Focus bracketing mode.
* Completely free, and no third party ads in the app (I only run third party ads on the website). Open Source.

(Some features may not be available on all devices, as they may depend on hardware or camera features, the Android version, etc.)

Website (and links to source code): http://opencamera.org.uk/

Note that it's not possible for me to test Open Camera on every Android device out there, so please test before using Open Camera to photo/video your wedding etc :)

App icon by Adam Lapinski. Open Camera also uses content under third party licences, see https://opencamera.org.uk/#licence

recentChanges:
Support for Android 10+ scoped storage. Note this means for Android 10+:

* Saving outside of DCIM is no longer possible unless using Storage Access Framework option. If you had set up a save folder outside of DCIM on Android 10+ it will reset to the default. Enable Settings/More camera controls/"Use Storage Access Framework" to save outside DCIM.

* If using Video subtitles, then .SRT files will show up in gallery apps unless using Storage Access Framework option.

Various bug fixes.
comments: Excellent Overall! what more can you ask for than a free camera app which supports unlimited photo taking functions. Program gives you full control over your photos from exposure to iso settings. Very Simple and easy to use. New auto level function was a bit distracting but has a setting to shut it off. Keep up the great work! THE BEST!!! Hands Down!!!

This has been very disappointing so far. Why does everytime I open the app the screen goes to landscape mode? Why does the only app that will open is messages instead of the gallery app that it let me choose from the very start? And why does the focus go haywire evertime I take a front camera shot even though it is literally laying on a solid unmovable wall! It has been this for a year now. For a year! And the last update this developer had? 2020!

Love this app! Love there's a feature that it can take lots of shots in one taking whereas my own Samsung phone doesn't. I don't have to rely on a Bluetooth remote or timer function, it just snaps away! A great Android alternative to LensBuddy on the iOS. Just wish there's a compliment features when it comes to solo shots. Lol it's silly but at least it will bring out the genuine smiles from us.

I've tried many camera apps because my default Samsung one is junk. This one works great and has a lot of features I wanted. The default has terrible color balance and the processing left many images looking like they were posterized. I like this app so much better. I haven't seen many ads at all. I am not using the video function so I can't speak to that. Thanks to the developers.

Not sold on this. I installed it because I'm looking for an app which allows longer exposure and finer controls than my default camera app, and I couldn't find any controls at all for manual exposure. Seems to have even fewer functionality than the default camera app. The menus are not intuitive.

title: Sweet Face Camera - Live Face Filters for Snapchat
description:
Sweet Face Camera is used by over 100 million people around the world. Best FREE face App and snap camera on Google Play! 🏆 You can snap perfect selfie & video with its funny face filters, cute stickers, and unique camera effects. title: Shutterfly: Cards, Gifts, Free Prints, Photo Books
description:
Welcome to your one-stop shop for personalized photo gifts, cards, home decor, photo books, prints and calendars. Browse endless custom card and photo gift options: from personalized wedding invitations and save the dates to custom photo gifts like jigsaw puzzles or blankets, Shutterfly has you covered with app-exclusive deals.

EXCLUSIVE DEALS & PROMO CODES — ONLY ON THE APP!
• Unlimited free 4x4 & 4x6 photo prints (same day)
• Free unlimited photo storage to save all the memories on your phone
• Enable push notifications to be the first to know all about Shutterfly’s great deals and promos offers!
 
CUSTOM PHOTO GIFTS & HOME DECOR
Create photo gifts and custom home decor, directly in the Shutterfly app. Make your own custom puzzles, photo blankets, personalized photo mugs, and more. Decorate your home for different occasions using wall art with our photo tiles, canvas prints, framed prints, and other custom wall art options.
 
CUSTOM CARDS & PERSONALIZED STATIONERY
Choose from a variety of custom card options, everything from personalized birthday cards to custom birth announcements and baby shower invites, and even thank you cards, to find the perfect sentiment and style that fits your family and friends.

PERSONALIZED WEDDING INVITATIONS & GIFTS
Wedding planning is made easy with Shutterfly. Make your own wedding invitations and address labels right in the app. Get custom wedding stationery, save the date cards, bridal party gifts, wedding gifts and decor, and more. After the wedding, remember the big day by creating wedding keepsakes such as personalized wedding photo books, canvas prints, and home decor.
 
GRADUATION ANNOUNCEMENTS, INVITATIONS, & GIFTS
Share your graduate’s joy and success with loved ones with Shutterfly’s custom graduation announcements. Whether you're throwing a graduation party or simply want to send grad photo cards to share life updates with friends and family, you can create personalized graduation announcements and invitations that are perfect for you. We also make it easy to personalize graduation gifts like photo books, personalized phone cases, and more to create meaningful grad gifts.
 
CUSTOM PHOTO BOOK STYLES
Choose from premium photo book styles like flush mount albums or layflat photo book designs. Make a photo book as a personalized gift or create a wedding photo album to capture lifelong memories. With Shutterfly’s Instant Books option, you can quickly upload your photos and we’ll make you a 6x6 photo book that’s fully customizable. Creating your own custom photo book is made easy in the Shutterfly app. 
 
PRINTS FOR ANY OCCASION
Our photo prints are high quality and made to last, perfect for hanging or displaying pictures of loved ones or for cherishing forever in a photo album. Choose from various photo print finishes—matte, glossy, & pearl photo paper, to match your style and taste. Want more options? Select from canvas prints, poster prints, collage photo prints, and more to display your favorite photos.
 
CREATE PERSONALIZED PHOTO CALENDARS
Start on any month during the year with Shutterfly’s calendars. Whether you are looking for wall calendars, desk calendars, or easel calendars, or finding the cutest way to showcase favorite photos of loved ones around the home, we’ve got you covered. Make your own custom calendar in the Shutterfly app.
 
UNLIMITED FREE PHOTO STORAGE
Upload, store, and organize your photos with unlimited free photo storage and save space on your device. We will never delete your photos, so you know that your pictures are safe and secure with Shutterfly’s photo storage app.
 
GIFTS, CARDS, AND PHOTO BOOKS FOR KIDS
Brand new designs and products just for kids! Whether you're celebrating a birthday party, holiday, or first communion, there are plenty of special occasions to buy gifts for kids year-round. Create gifts for girls and boys that encourage learning, imagination, and fun. Shop backpacks, folders, notebooks, bean bags, kids’ room decor, and so much more.

comments: It's extremely frustrating to not be able to do one last review before hitting the order button. On order to review it, everything defaults and that makes me extremely nervous because I have had to scratch an entire order after arrival because one picture was sideways. I went to change the quantity, and everything I had saved was undone. That's super annoying. It would be nice to be able to review my order in the confirmation e-mail.

Excellent from start to finish! I ordered, for the first time, a memory book for last Christmas formyin-laws. I recently lost my husband, their son. I created a memory book with all of the pictures of him. They cried, but loved it so much. It was very well done. No mistakes and wrapped beautifully with strong packaging for shipping. Thanks Shutterfly. You came through with a very important order and created a loyal customer.

super Easy but very disappointed with the quality of prints I ordered. The books have came out great but the prints, both 4x6 and 11x14 , even taken with quality camera not just phones were distorted and Pixelated, I'm certain a computer could have printed them more clearer. not sure if I would recommend or use to print prints.

It took me so many pain staking hours to make this book. The app is the most un-user-friendly app I have ever used. It froze, it told me I needed to close or wait, everytime I moved a gosh darn sticker, it started spinning, turned white, and, lo & behold, when it reappeared my sticker was gone!!! I didn't even dare trying to put captions in. It was a nightmare!!!

All the products I have ever ordered have been top quality, typically better than most companies I have tried, thus the reason I continue to choose Shutterfly. However, the sales that are advertised can sometimes be deceiving.

title: NeonArt Photo Editor: Photo Effects, Collage Maker
description:
NeonArt photo editor offers you the best photo editing experience with dozens of neon effects and neon spirals. Your amazing pictures will grab all the attention with neon sketch art. Get ready for the new generation pics art experience with the shiny grime stickers and stylish text. Face tune and retouch selfies just in one tap, then add motion and astonishing picture effects. Picture editing is so easy and fun with NeonArt. When you are done with picture editing, collage your beautiful pics with the pic collage maker using the glowing photo grids. Magic photo editor brings fun to your photos with the gradient neon line art. Combine stunning sketch art with the cool drip effects. Try stylish glowing sketch and grime stickers, then share your artwork on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, VK and Tik Tok to get many likes :).

🎨  Aesthetic Picture Editor: 
NeonArt picture editor has all the picture editing tools to create fabulous artworks.  No crop is needed to share your brilliant pic on social media. Combine neon effects with retro filters for pictures :) . Try neon sketch art in many different glowing colors. Explore astonishing drip effect and create a cyberpunk background from a neon background to make your pic stand out :) . 

✨ Neon Photo Effects and Spirals: 
 Let your pictures glow in the dark with neon photo effects :) . Emoji backgrounds and colorful picture frames are here for you to create marvellous pictures. Surprising AI spiral editor has vast amount of neon spirals to bring motion to your pics. There are even some epic spirals available made of emojis and flowers. Use beautiful geometric spirals like circles or triangles to create digital art :) . Finalize magic photo editing with cool neon frame for pictures.

😎  Background Changer: 
Remove background in one tap and add a pretty neon background easily :) . You can find yourself in a street full of lights in one tap thanks to the neon backgrounds. Many glowing background designs and cyber punk photo collages available for you. 

💖  Neon Stickers and Text: 
To personalize your pics use some image stickers and celebrate special days like birthdays. Also there are loads of cute animal stickers, pick one and change it’s size easily. There are dozens of glowing text templates, also you can type whatever you like and change it’s style and color to personalize your photos. Magic cyber punk photo editor pro has all the features you need.

🤳  Selfie Camera Effects: 
NeonArt comes up with a magnificent selfie camera. Snap selfie and add camera effects in one tap :). Selfie camera finds the best light for you and smoothens your face automatically. Enjoy the live selfie camera effects and cyber-punk filters for pictures now! Dripping effect is perfect for selfies. Try bewildering drip effects and bring out your inner drip artist. Neon photo editor will bring you a brand-new image.

🎉  Pic Collage Maker and Photo Grids: 
Using the photo filters and editing tools like AI spirals and sketch art you‘ll have dozens of pretty selfies :) . NeonArt photo collage maker helps you to montage you pictures to prepare memes. Shiny photo grids, image layouts and cyberpunk frames will make your picture collaging experience super fun and easy. Photo collage maker has photo layouts for all tastes, create breath taking photo collage and funny memes just in seconds. Don’t forget to explore neon stickers and cyber-punk effect for the unforgettable photo collage experience.

NeonArt photo editor pro is best photo editing app with neon blend effects and awesome filters for pictures. Edit like a pro and combine drip effects with the glowing spirals to create cyber punk theme. You’ll love the gradient neon line art with hand drawn sketch designs. Finally use pic collage maker to montage pics in one special post. You don’t need any other photo editing app, once you have Neon photo editor. Share your artwork on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, VK and TikTok to get many likes :)

comments: I gotta give it up to these developers. This app is fantastic!!! So many different options and selections. I love that I can put my phone away for the rest of the day and when I come back to this app it picks up where I left off. You guys are a great team. I'm truly impressed with the functionality of the app. One thing I would like to see is the option to change colors of the spiral and other effects that don't offer that option. I look forward to any improvements and update you guys push out!

I never wanted to pay. I just tapped on 7 day trial just to see my ₹2399 go away at the same time. I didn't recieve the trial, I got deducted immediately. Though app is good, I used it briefly, but please I didn't wanna pay for it. Developers please help me out. Even Google is not refunding my money

I didn't want to pay at all, I got a 7 day free trial to test out the premium options, and I canceled the subscription aswell. I woke up with $50 deducted from my PayPal that I mowed lawns all month for, and I desperately want my money back.
I have never seen such such a free app with great easy to use editing tools. Thank you so much for making this app. The ads are a bit annoying. But it is completely considerable.
This is one of the best app for editing , I love everything in this app but the ads are ridiculous and it continuously say to pay money to get the pro version, overall it's a very good app☺️

title: Artisan: Cartoon Photo Editor & Art Photo Filters
description:
Artisan sarjakuva kuvan muokkaus on paras karikatyyriohjelma sarjakuvaan ja digitaalisen taiteen tekemiseen monilla taiteellisilla valokuvasuodattimilla. Käsityöläisten sarjakuvien valmistaja esittelee monia vektoritaitesuodattimia ja karikatyyriefektejä kuvien sarjakuvaamiseksi ja avatarifioimiseksi yhdellä napautuksella. Tee anime-taidetta muuntamalla kuvat maalauksiksi ja sarjakuviksi nyt! Artisan-sarjakuva-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on all-in-one-kuvankäsittelyohjelma, joka tarjoaa henkeäsalpaavia selfie-kameratehosteita kuvien muokkaamiseen, avatarifiointiin ja taiteeseen erilaisilla digitaalisen taiteen suodattimilla. Valmista kuvitus Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, TikTok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi paljon tykkäyksiä!

🎨  Sarjakuva Kuvan Muokkaus: 
Jos sinulla on Artisan-sarjakuvasovellus, et tarvitse muita kuvankäsittelysovelluksia valokuviesi muuntamiseksi sarjakuviksi. Valitse upea kuva kuvagalleriastasi muokattavaksi ja sarjakuvaksi. Tutki öljymaalaussuodattimia ja upeita valokuvatehosteita saadaksesi upean profiilikuvan. Piirrä itseäsi avatar-suodattimilla nähdäksesi itsesi suosikki animaatiohahmosi. Saatavilla on paljon upeita valokuvasuodattimia ja -tehosteita, kuten väri-, luonnos- ja öljymaalaussuodatin kuvien retusointiin. Muuta valokuva sarjakuvaksi  tai mangaksi muutamassa sekunnissa taiteellisen avatar-suodatinsovelluksen ansiosta. Viimeistele kuvankäsittely legendaarisilla memoji-tarroilla, neon-spiraaleilla ja söpöllä tekstillä. Montaasi kuvia kollaasikoneella käyttämällä kauniita valokuvakehyksiä ja tarroja syntymäpäiville, pääsiäiselle ja Halloweenille!

✨  Taiteelliset öljymaalaussuodattimet ja pop-artefektit: 
Artisan-taidetoimittaja on hieno vapauttamaan sisäinen taiteilijasi ja muuttamaan kuvasi taiteellisiksi maalauksiksi käyttämällä taide- ja luonnosefektejä. Sarjakuva-suodattimien lisäksi rakastat lyijykynäsuodatin.

🤳  Selfie-kameran tehosteet: 
Artisan-sarjakuva-sovellus tarjoaa hämmästyttäviä selfie-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita sarjakuvaan itsellesi ilmaiseksi! Ota itsesi taidekameralla ja piirrä itsesi nyt! Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on johtava digitaalisen taiteen sovellus- ja avatar-valmistaja, jolla on kasvojen live-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita.

💥  Mahtavat sarjakuvataustat: 
Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma poistaa täydellisesti taustan, joten voit valita loistavan taustan ja käyttää tippumisvaikutusta! Paljon värikkäitä kuvioita ja väriroiskeita käytettävissä manga-taiteen tekemiseen.

💖  Esteettinen tiputusvaikutus: 
Uskomattomat tippuvat vaikutukset yhdistettynä sarjakuviin. Photoshop-vaikutus vain muutamassa sekunnissa sarjakuvan tekijän ansiosta. Joko hämärtää taustaa tai vaihda se upealla anime-taustakuvalla! Sarjakuvasuodattimiin yhdistettävissä on monia tippuvia vaikutuksia.

😍  Profiilikuvan luoja: 
Piirrä itsesi luomaan upeita avatar-profiilikuvia Artisan-avatar-luojan ja emoji-valmistajan kanssa. Voit lisätä lyijykynän luonnosefektin ja supertaustat tuomaan vielä hauskempaa karikatyyreihisi. Käytä eeppiseen kuvankäsittelyyn sarjakuva muotokuvaeditoria ja hauskaa sarjakuvan valmistajaa. Anime-kuvankäsittelyohjelmassa on kaikkien aikojen paras AI-sarjakuvasuodatin.

Artisan sarjakuva editori on kaikki yhdessä sarjakuva-sovelluksessa, jossa voit animoida kuvia, avatarifioida itsesi sarjakuva-kasvosuodattimilla ja kauniilla piirustussuodattimilla kuville. Liity uuteen memoji-trendiin ja muokkaa valokuvia ammattilaisena Artisanin kanssa saadaksesi vaikutuksen ystäviisi! Valmista henkeäsalpaavia animoituja kuvia Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, Tik Tok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi niin paljon tykkäyksiä.
descriptionHTML:
Artisan sarjakuva kuvan muokkaus on paras karikatyyriohjelma sarjakuvaan ja digitaalisen taiteen tekemiseen monilla taiteellisilla valokuvasuodattimilla. Käsityöläisten sarjakuvien valmistaja esittelee monia vektoritaitesuodattimia ja karikatyyriefektejä kuvien sarjakuvaamiseksi ja avatarifioimiseksi yhdellä napautuksella. Tee anime-taidetta muuntamalla kuvat maalauksiksi ja sarjakuviksi nyt! Artisan-sarjakuva-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on all-in-one-kuvankäsittelyohjelma, joka tarjoaa henkeäsalpaavia selfie-kameratehosteita kuvien muokkaamiseen, avatarifiointiin ja taiteeseen erilaisilla digitaalisen taiteen suodattimilla. Valmista kuvitus Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, TikTok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi paljon tykkäyksiä!

🎨 Sarjakuva Kuvan Muokkaus:
Jos sinulla on Artisan-sarjakuvasovellus, et tarvitse muita kuvankäsittelysovelluksia valokuviesi muuntamiseksi sarjakuviksi. Valitse upea kuva kuvagalleriastasi muokattavaksi ja sarjakuvaksi. Tutki öljymaalaussuodattimia ja upeita valokuvatehosteita saadaksesi upean profiilikuvan. Piirrä itseäsi avatar-suodattimilla nähdäksesi itsesi suosikki animaatiohahmosi. Saatavilla on paljon upeita valokuvasuodattimia ja -tehosteita, kuten väri-, luonnos- ja öljymaalaussuodatin kuvien retusointiin. Muuta valokuva sarjakuvaksi tai mangaksi muutamassa sekunnissa taiteellisen avatar-suodatinsovelluksen ansiosta. Viimeistele kuvankäsittely legendaarisilla memoji-tarroilla, neon-spiraaleilla ja söpöllä tekstillä. Montaasi kuvia kollaasikoneella käyttämällä kauniita valokuvakehyksiä ja tarroja syntymäpäiville, pääsiäiselle ja Halloweenille!

✨ Taiteelliset öljymaalaussuodattimet ja pop-artefektit:
Artisan-taidetoimittaja on hieno vapauttamaan sisäinen taiteilijasi ja muuttamaan kuvasi taiteellisiksi maalauksiksi käyttämällä taide- ja luonnosefektejä. Sarjakuva-suodattimien lisäksi rakastat lyijykynäsuodatin.

🤳 Selfie-kameran tehosteet:
Artisan-sarjakuva-sovellus tarjoaa hämmästyttäviä selfie-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita sarjakuvaan itsellesi ilmaiseksi! Ota itsesi taidekameralla ja piirrä itsesi nyt! Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on johtava digitaalisen taiteen sovellus- ja avatar-valmistaja, jolla on kasvojen live-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita.

💥 Mahtavat sarjakuvataustat:
Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma poistaa täydellisesti taustan, joten voit valita loistavan taustan ja käyttää tippumisvaikutusta! Paljon värikkäitä kuvioita ja väriroiskeita käytettävissä manga-taiteen tekemiseen.

Uskomattomat tippuvat vaikutukset yhdistettynä sarjakuviin. Photoshop-vaikutus vain muutamassa sekunnissa sarjakuvan tekijän ansiosta. Joko hämärtää taustaa tai vaihda se upealla anime-taustakuvalla! Sarjakuvasuodattimiin yhdistettävissä on monia tippuvia vaikutuksia.

comments: Ok so the app itself is great i love the filters but i didnt realize i had signed up for a yearly subscription!!! Omg 59$$$ That is insane im waiting to gear back about a refund. To be continued.............

Nice app. However, our place has poor internet connection aside from the fact that I can't used it for entire year, if ever subscribed. 1 month subscription if allowed may prompts many to use this app.
Very pleasantly surprised. As one of those people who thinks I don't photograph well, this app created some great images that I definitely would share. Nice one

I was trying to get the 3 day trial and got charged for the whole year immediately. Misleading. Uninstalled. Edit - Developer commented on my review asking me to email them but they didn't respond to my email.
I think this app is worth it, it has good filters but one problem is that a lot of the filters are pro or premium. Other than that it's a great app

title: Face Live Camera: Photo Filters, Emojis, Stickers
description:
Face camera is the best photo filter app to take amazing selfies with the funny camera effects. See the amazing live photo filters directly on your face. It is so much fun to take wonderful pictures with the live face cam. Download sweet snap camera now to take a selfie with the famous dog filter, cat filter and much more :). Face live camera has all the live cute animal stickers, even the cute stickers such as angel wings and crowns. We offer the best pics art experience with the live camera filters. Join the new photo filter trend and bring color to your brilliant images. Share your awesome photo on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, VK and Tik Tok.

 Selfie camera with effects: 
Snap a sweet selfie or shoot a video with the face cam! Face camera automatically makes your selfie more beautiful with the beauty filter, so you don’t need to wear makeup and retouch selfies. Get ready for the beautiful selfies without editing. Face cam slims your selfie, smoothens your skin and finds the best light for you. You’ll have lots of artistic selfies with the face cam without putting on makeup. You can photo collage and remix photos with the pic collage maker. Bring some fun to your selfie with the cute animal stickers and emojis. Photoshop effects on your photo just in seconds with the selfie camera. Edit photos and retouch selfies with the fabulous emoji camera effects.

 Funny Animal Stickers: 
It is so much fun to take pics with the live face filters. See the funny stickers for pictures and emoji directly on your selfie while taking a photo. In addition to the classic dog filter, many different selfie filters are waiting for you in this face app. Dalmatian dog filter with black and white dog ears is so adorable. Polka dog selfie filters are waiting for you in various colors, explore them all and surprise your friends. Open your mouth while taking a video to see the adorable dog tongue. In addition to the dog filters, bring some color to your images using rabbit filter with cute rabbit ears in pink. 

 Funny Photo Effects: 
Sweet snap camera comes up with free photo filters. Face camera effects are great for sweet selfies. Snap a selfie with the stunning crowns. Crowns in different styles are available, choose the one that fits your style the best. Floral crowns are the most popular crowns, also try on the crowns made of the butterflies. Even crowns with rabbit ears are available. Take a photo with cool sunglasses and fancy summer hats for the summer spirit. Sunglasses look so real on your selfie. Don’t forget to take a pic with the angel effect, with the angel wings and a crown. 

 Face filters for Pictures: 
Face tune your selfie instantly and have a smooth skin for flawless images. Then snap selfie using stunning emoji camera filters and photo effects :). Shoot video with the cute animal effects. Use angel calculator to calculate the angel score of your charming photo :) . Save videos with the camera effects and share with your friends to have more fun. Art filters and sketch effects make your photos more colorful and romantic with heart effect. Face live camera will take your photo editing experience to the next level. Edit photos with the funny effects. Retouch stunning selfies with the picture editor. Take awesome pics with the insta filters. You’ll have so much fun with the filters for Instagram. 

With this sweet snap camera, you won’t need any other photo editor free with art effects. All the funny camera effects and live animal stickers are here for you to take videos and sweet selfies. Face filters for pictures are hilarious. There are cute photo filters available like angel filter and heart effect which are great for videos. Also the funny animal effects like the dog filter with a dog tongue. Snap a sweet selfie with the face cam and share your photo on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, VK and TikTok to get many likes.

title: Photo Editor with Background Eraser - MagiCut
description:
★MagiCut is a powerful photo editor that lets you synthesise the background of your photo anytime, anywhere. It helps you edit your photos like a pro.★

Features
💥Selfie Face App  - Customize exclusive beauty style.
💥3D Cartoon Effects - Use 3D toon app to cartoon yourself.
💥Remove The Sky - Replace it with any background you want.
💥Magic Brush - Bokeh effect with magic brush tools.
💥Mosaic - You can do a simple photo mosaic.
💥Remove Objects - Use the magic brush to remove any objects you don’t want in your photo.
💥Collage Maker - There are lots of grids and frames available to choose from.
💥Professional Adjustment - Repair old photos.
💥Photo Editor - Provide useful editing tools that meet all your needs.
💥Text Editing - Choose any font you like or just doodle on the screen.

Smart CutOut
With MagiCut, you can create stunning pictures easily. Auto cut and paste will select and extract objects through detect so that you can paste onto any background. Use montage editing techniques, put yourself next to any celebrity you like or teleport yourself to any corner of the world. For entertainment only.

Professional Face Editor
Face app camera can modify facial features and create natural beauty. A wide range of high-quality beauty filters for unique editing and sense of style. In a few taps, our advanced tools will remove any pores, blemishes or pimples and will. Tap to crop, blur, and fine-tune your photos for a beautiful look. You can also use "face" to change your hair color. Enjoy a variety of dynamic stickers while showing the perfect selfie, you can record a short video and share it with your friends. 

Special effects function
With one tap, you can change the background with a new sky.Just select several pictures, Photo collage maker instantly remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. Remove whatever you feel is spoiling your photos. 3D cartoon effect offers astounding filters for pictures to turn photo to cartoon. You can even cartoonify photos to turn into an anime character with big heads. 


✅* With this cutout editor, you can combine multiple photos into one background.

✅* We provide technology to identify your photos, automatically delete the original background and remove unwanted objects.For entertainment only.

✅* Manually process the details of the picture to let you enjoy the fun of editing.

✅* Adjust Picture - Adjust contrast, exposure and brightness manually by precise control.

✅* Crop - Crop the picture to any size you need to fit all social media perfectly.

✅* Fusion - Blend images with different light and shadows to make eye-catching photos.

✅* Text - Add artistic subtitles to the image. Multiple styles and fonts are provided.

✅* Graffiti - offers a variety of brushes for you to draw creative graffiti on the picture.

✅* Blur - Use blurring effects to make stylish pictures.

✅* Templates - Select 100+ layouts and templates created by professional designers.

✅* Beauty - Brighten your eyes and smooth your skin to make you stand out in any photo.

✅*Personalized graffiti – Provide a variety of creative brushes to release your unlimited creativity.

Download Now, and have fun! 

- - - Contact us - - - 
Email: malick.aiqi@gmail.com

comments: App starts out perfect! Gives you the ability to make amazing photo cut outs, especially if your smart device comes with a stylus. But sadly the main functionality on what made you probably download the app in the first place! Becomes unavailable! And forces you to sign up for a paid subscription! 😡 That gives you access to the same feature that was previously free! Another app ruined by greed! 😤🤦🏿

Really disappointed how to set you up for auto-pay so I lost $69 or whatever when my free trial is up and I forgot to unsubscribe. And of course the developer waited 48 hours before telling me that you can get a refund within 48 hours of the charges go figure! Disgusting!!
The app starts out amazing, but then to do anything, even to save a picture to your gallery, you have to sign up for a paid subscription. I don't have the spare money just for a random subscription.

It's okay if you want to do it manually but the automatic crop is terrible. I even tried it on a picture (of a single item) with a white background; it removed 90% of the image and left me with a 10pixel diameter circle.

Wow It's great! It does what it says on the tin and allows you to export and save effortlessly right to gallery or wherever without any hassle to buy or deal with advertising. Amazing! 5 Stars guys . I wish more apps was this hassle free seriously.

title: Cut Paste Photos
description:
Change photo background with single click.

Cut or copy people, animals, cars, and backgrounds into other photos and create new photo collages. 

Want to swap faces? Cut one face and paste it onto another. Want to remove photo background? Cut the people out and put them on another background. Want to remove people from photos? Then this is the app for you.

Missed someone in a family photo? Add them into photos without the need professional photo editing tools. This is the best copy paste tool for photos.

Cut Paste Photos comes with 100's of photo editing features. Main photo tools:
1. Cut Photos with AI Background Eraser: Cut photos or extract people or your pets from photo background. Auto Background Eraser removes background instantly and gives you photos you can paste on any background.

2. Copy Photos with Manual Copy: Copy photos using our Manual Photo Cut to cut out exactly the parts you want. Ideal for Face Swap and Face Changer. Swap faces by cutting photo and placing cut face over another face.

3. Advanced Photo Editor: Edit the cut photos for sharper, exact edges. Ideal to remove people or objects from photos.

4. Paste On Photos: Paste the cut photos on any backgrounds from your gallery. Add yourself into famous locations or in photos with famous people.

5. Photo Collages: Create your own collages by pasting cut photos on our custom backgrounds, or create without grids to make freeform collages.

6. Color Pop: Our color splash tool lets you keep rich color saturation while changing the rest to black and white, to highlight the most important part of the photo.

7. Photo Clone: Paste multiple copies of people in photos to create a fun clone effect. Make sure to try Motion Effect along with Clone to try out various clone photo styles. Photo Mirror effects shows mirrored people repeating in photos.

8. Text In Photo: Use our advanced text editor to add text on photos or convert cut photos into text. Text On Photos and Collages include various fonts, textures, and advanced text styles.

9. Double Exposure: Create double exposure effects easily with our tool. Create double exposure with scenic nature photos.

10. Photo Filters: Create awesome Cut Paste Photos effects with photo filters including 100's of photo filters. Cut Paste Photo editor tools include transform features like Flip Photo Vertically and Flip Photo Horizontally.

11. Photo Collage Editor: Cut Paste Photos now includes Photo Collage Editor where you can include cut and pasted photos from various sources and enhance with Text on Pictures and Draw on Photo Collages.


Photo Source: Cut Paste Photo Effect now allows you to use photos from our vast image search and your own device gallery. Image Search lets you search photos from the web to cut and paste in your Photo Collage Editor.Photo Backgrounds now includes image search from the web, our top photo backgrounds that we licensed specially for you, and your own gallery photos.


Photo Stickers: 1000's of Photo Stickers included in the app.

Cut Paste Photos with advanced tools like Advanced Photo Editor, Magnifying Glass, Collage Maker, Auto Background Eraser and more lets you create the best-looking photos and Photo Collages. Changing photo backgrounds is now just one click away.

Change photo background with single click.

Cut or copy people, animals, cars, and backgrounds into other photos and create new photo collages.

Want to swap faces? Cut one face and paste it onto another. Want to remove photo background? Cut the people out and put them on another background. Want to remove people from photos? Then this is the app for you.

Missed someone in a family photo? Add them into photos without the need professional photo editing tools. This is the best copy paste tool for photos.

Cut Paste Photos comes with 100's of photo editing features. Main photo tools:
1. Cut Photos with AI Background Eraser: Cut photos or extract people or your pets from photo background. Auto Background Eraser removes background instantly and gives you photos you can paste on any background.

2. Copy Photos with Manual Copy: Copy photos using our Manual Photo Cut to cut out exactly the parts you want. Ideal for Face Swap and Face Changer. Swap faces by cutting photo and placing cut face over another face.

3. Advanced Photo Editor: Edit the cut photos for sharper, exact edges. Ideal to remove people or objects from photos.

4. Paste On Photos: Paste the cut photos on any backgrounds from your gallery. Add yourself into famous locations or in photos with famous people.

5. Photo Collages: Create your own collages by pasting cut photos on our custom backgrounds, or create without grids to make freeform collages.

6. Color Pop: Our color splash tool lets you keep rich color saturation while changing the rest to black and white, to highlight the most important part of the photo.

7. Photo Clone: Paste multiple copies of people in photos to create a fun clone effect. Make sure to try Motion Effect along with Clone to try out various clone photo styles. Photo Mirror effects shows mirrored people repeating in photos.

8. Text In Photo: Use our advanced text editor to add text on photos or convert cut photos into text. Text On Photos and Collages include various fonts, textures, and advanced text styles.

9. Double Exposure: Create double exposure effects easily with our tool. Create double exposure with scenic nature photos.

10. Photo Filters: Create awesome Cut Paste Photos effects with photo filters including 100's of photo filters. Cut Paste Photo editor tools include transform features like Flip Photo Vertically and Flip Photo Horizontally.

11. Photo Collage Editor: Cut Paste Photos now includes Photo Collage Editor where you can include cut and pasted photos from various sources and enhance with Text on Pictures and Draw on Photo Collages.


Photo Source: Cut Paste Photo Effect now allows you to use photos from our vast image search and your own device gallery. Image Search lets you search photos from the web to cut and paste in your Photo Collage Editor.Photo Backgrounds now includes image search from the web, our top photo backgrounds that we licensed specially for you, and your own gallery photos.


Photo Stickers: 1000's of Photo Stickers included in the app.

Cut Paste Photos with advanced tools like Advanced Photo Editor, Magnifying Glass, Collage Maker, Auto Background Eraser and more lets you create the best-looking photos and Photo Collages. Changing photo backgrounds is now just one click away.
summary: Cut, Copy Photo and Paste Image, Photo Collage Editor, Face Swap, Color Splash
developerAddress:
Dexati LLC,
4900 Hopyard Road,
Suite 100,
Pleasanton, CA 94588.
recentChanges:
Bugfix release.
Improved pro user experience.
comments: I'm well versed in many types of editing software on (pc/mobile) and I honestly found the UI too confusing. Nothing seems to happen when I manually cut an image, when I use the smart cut tool on the desired image I am taken to a blank canvas that I can add a background/other edits, but I am never able to actually paste what I cut. I tried about three times and gave up because I have no interest in watching tutorials for what should be a fairly intuitive app. Also there are too many ads.

More ads than you could ever eat! With prices only an advertising executive could pay... Monthly! Maybe this is a show app to prove you can print money. That said this is probably the easiest and most versatile of all available like apps and there are a lot of similar apps. All told in many ways it's like an high functioning alcoholic. Edgy costly fun that may well turn and punch you out.

This app did exactly what I needed. I needed to paste a photo, of just the cropped face, on to another photo. It was super easy to do and didn't take me long to figure it out. There are ads in between each step but that was fine too. I never leave reviews but I thought this deserved it because it completely met my needs!!

This is an amazing app, intuitive, easy to use and smooth. So I understand them wanting to make some money off of it. But the purchase price doesn't make a lick of sense, unless you get paid to make memes. And using the free version is a totally successful exercise in seeing just how intrusive and annoying an app can make its ads. If you're patient, the free app might work for you. I bet the pay app is great but I'll never know because I manage my budget.

BEST APP EVER. It was a little confusing at first... but then when I got the hang of it I managed to edit myself onto a picture of a horse PERFECTLY. Please don't listen to the hate reviews because this app is amazing. Believe me, download it, you will not regret it.

title: Chatbooks - Print Monthly Photo Books
description:
Get your photos off your phone and into your hands with the Chatbooks app! It’s never been easier to print all your family photos into a collection of beautiful photo books. 
Our bestselling 5x7” Monthbooks are designed to show off the everyday photos you take on your phone. Start a Monthbooks subscription to get a new 30-page photo book every month. Add photos right from your phone camera roll in the Chatbooks app, edit, and send to print in just a few taps. Cancel anytime and always get free shipping on any Chatbooks photo book subscription. 
Chatbooks photo books offer softcover or hardcover options, a range of sizes from 6x6” to 10x10”, and several chic spine and cover colors and designs. Add a contributor for a photo book that includes everyone’s photos that your whole family will love. Photo books make swoon-worthy personalized decor: start a collection today to style the ultimate shelfie. Plus, free shipping options are available on all products in the U.S.! 
It’s seriously beyond easy to create Chatbooks. Buzzfeed says: “You can have a beautiful book in minutes.” Millions of Chatbookers use the Chatbooks app to print their photos—join them!

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: The service of chat books itself is amazing and such a great deal, however the app itself is so glitchy. I've had multiple times where I couldn't get all of my photos to work , one time it wouldn't send to print without talking to customer service a bunch, I've had the app freeze and crash a ton. If I ever put the wrong photo and want to switch it, it won't ever let me, it's very frustrating sometimes. I wish they'd make the app run better and then it would be an amazing service overall

I would use this if the app if it was not so buggy. Selecting photo from your gallery is not an option, you must navigate photos using their app and it is NOT user-friendly. Adding photos to an existing book was also a challenge as the add photos button would not always appear. Love the idea but the app just ruined the experience.

I really enjoy this app in general. The idea behind it, layout, and simplicity are all really great. However, it still needs a lot of work with the glitching issues. My progress would get halted fairly often by the app simply stopping allowing me to edit anymore, and at checkout it would not let me select PayPal as a payment method. If you could get these types of glitches resolved I would really love using it!

I want to love this app so bad but it won't work for me at all. It is struggling to upload pictures and won't rotate them at all. I don't have days to devote to making one tiny book. Work on your app and I'll be a customer for a long time.
The only negative...is that it won't read in photos from all folders. I had to resort to screen shots to get photos off cloud or messenger for example

This Logo Creator app is useful for making Business Logo, advertising Logo, social media marketing Logo.

If you enjoyed the experience and download your free creation; all they ask for is to tell your friends, give a nice review. Acknowledging them anywhere you use your design is a nice way to give thanks!

This is EXACTLY WHAT YOU NEED if you are a beginner like me. Use preloaded templates or upload your own image. It was AMAZING how easy it was to complete a logo. I'm currently on my second one and have plans to do more.

It was so simple to use and I love the finished product however the draw section wasn't any use. Loads of choice, styles variety and colour I get the images are premade but you can definitely make them your own
App is very easy to use and so engrossing like an art project. It's so enjoyable to use that you don't feel like working. Yet, this is a powerful tool for its functionality.

It's a very nice app I love the fact about it. Very easy to use and good for editing I love the fact about the app and that's why I'm rating a very good 5 🌟 for you guys and hope to continue making a nice like this..
